Thanks to this business, he was able to provide his children an education and support his family. He is asking for a micro-loan to continue increasing his stock of merchandise and to purchase new books.

loans.use: to increase his stock of merchandise and purchase new books

loans.name: Hermite

texts.fr: Hermite a 42 ans, elle est mariée et elle a trois enfants. Elle gère sa propre activité dans laquelle elle vend des haricots. Elle demande un microcrédit pour augmenter son stock de marchandises. À l’avenir, elle espère attirer plus de clients.
texts.en: Hermite is 42 years old, and she is married with three children. She runs her own business in which she sells dried beans. She is asking for a small loan to grow her inventory. In future, she hopes to attract more customers.

loans.use: to buy some sacks of dried beans for resale.

loans.name: Khushvakht

texts.en:
Khushvakht is a 32-year-old resident of the city of Qurgan-Tube. He is an honest and smart person. Khushvakht is married and a father of two children.

Khushvakht provides taxi services. He serves people and earns money to provide for his family. He always tries to improve his family's life.

Now he needs a loan to repair his car. He earns a living with the help of this car and does not want to lose his source of income. Khushvakht believes in you and your support.

loans.use: To repair his car

loans.name: San Isidro De Yanahuara Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “SAN ISIDRO DE YANAHUARA”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Urubamba, perteneciente a la provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco.

La socia Arminda es una persona trabajadora, ella se dedica a la crianza de gallos de pelea y a la vez los cría para venderlos a sus clientes en las ferias para el consumo humano. con este negocio desea sacar adelante su único hijo, esta labor necesita muchas horas de dedicación.La socia tiene 27 años y las ganas de seguir trabajando para tener una mejor calidad de vida.
La socia solicito el crédito para comprar gallos, los cuales amaestrara y aportaran en su negocio.

Los otros socios se dedican al negocio de crianza de animales, negocio de tienda de abarrotes, negocio de venta de chicha y negocio de venta de cuyes.

Los socios están contentos por el crédito que le otorgaron los inversionistas de KIVA ,  y se comprometen pagar sus cuotas puntualmente.
texts.en:
The members belong to San Isidro de Yanahuara Communal Bank, located in the district of Urubamba in the province of Urubamba and department of Cusco.

Arminda is a hardworking person. She earns a living raising fighting chickens, and at the same time she raises them to sell to her customers in the market for human consumption. With this business she wants to move her only child ahead. This work requires many hours of dedication. She is 27 years old, and wants to continue working to have a better quality of life.

She is requesting a loan to buy chickens which she will train, and they will support her business. The other members earn a living raising animals, running a grocery store, selling chicha [a corn drink], and selling guinea pigs.

The members are pleased with the loan that has been provided by the Kiva lenders, and they promise to make their payments on time.

loans.use: to buy chickens.

loans.name: Varsenik

texts.en:
Here is Varsenik, living in Haykadzor village with her parents-in-law, husband and son. She and all of her family members are occupied in agriculture. The farm that they run is located near their house and includes oxen, cows, calves, pigs, piglets, sheep and hens. They also keep three colonies of bees and cultivate wheat.

Varsenik requested this loan to purchase fertilizer for land cultivation and forage for feeding the livestock. This will greatly help her to sustain the farm in the winter, and get income that is vital for family's basic needs.

loans.use: to pay for fertilizer for land cultivation and forage for feeding the livestock.

loans.name: Beth

texts.en:
Beth is a married woman, and she has two children. She describes herself to be optimistic.

Beth operates a retail business where she sells clothes. She has been involved in this business for six years. Her business is located in a good area and her primary customers are locals. She describes her biggest business challenge to be changes in season.

Beth will use the KES 90,000 loan to buy more stock of clothes. This is her third loan with SMEP Microfinance Bank. Her previous loans were repaid successfully. She will use the anticipated profits to invest in other businesses.

Beth hopes that in the future, she will have better living conditions.

loans.use: to buy more stock of clothes.

loans.name: Mubashira

texts.en:
Mubashira is 30 years old, married, and has been running a small general store in her community for many years with the support of her husband (also shown in the photo). She offers a variety of grocery items at a reasonable price and has retained many customers who regularly shop at her store. Mubashira makes enough to provide for her family.

To make her store fully stocked, she has requested a loan of 45,000 PKR, which she will use to buy rice, sugar, grains, biscuits, oil and flour from the market at lower rates to make her stock available for her customers. In this way she will be able to meet the increasing demand consistently. Mubashira wishes to utilize part of her revenues for providing a good quality life to her family members.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, grains, biscuits, oil and flour from the market at lower rates to make her stock available for her customers.

loans.name: Esteban Daniel

texts.es: Esteban tiene 21 años de edad, es de estado civil soltero, tiene un hijo, Luis de 5 años quien estudia en una institución de su localidad, Esteban se dedica a la agricultura hace 6 años atrás, es una persona muy dedicada y responsable , gracias a esta dura actividad él puede sacar adelante a su hijo.  Necesita del  crédito para invertir  en sus sembríos de papa ya que es su único ingreso económico y así poder aumentar sus ingresos económicos para satisfacer las necesidades de el y su hijo.
texts.en:
Esteban is 21 years old, single, and has a 5 year old son named Luis who attends a local school. Esteban has worked in agriculture for 6 years, is a very dedicated and responsible person, and thanks to this tough job he's able to support his son.

He needs a loan to invest in potato planting since it's his only income, so that he can increase his income to meet he and his son's needs.

loans.use: To purchase manure for his potato crop.

loans.name: Shorena

texts.en:
Shorena is a 38-year-old married woman. She lives with her husband and two children in Kutaisi District. Shorena works at local sausage factory and earns a monthly salary. Her husband works as an electrician.

Shorena decided to open her own factory and start producing sausages. The StartUp Loan Program, which is a joint initiative of Kiva and Credo, enables her to get a loan of 500 USD. With the received credit she will purchase equipment which she needs to produce sausages at home. Shorena is very experienced at this field and hopes that this business will be profitable for her family.

loans.use: to purchase equipment and produce sausages at home to sell.

loans.name: Magaly

texts.fr: Magalie a diversifié son stock de marchandises. Elle y a ajouté des des boites de saumons et du hareng fumés. Cela a permis d'attirer de nouveaux clients. Ses ventes ont légèrement augmenté.
texts.en: Magalie has diversified her stock of merchandise, to which she has added cans of salmon and smoked herring. This has enable her to attract new customers. Her sales have increased a bit.

loans.use: to diversify her products.

loans.name: Joseph

texts.fr: Joseph, 47 ans, marié, possède une boulangerie et vend de la farine. Apres quelques démarches, il a obtenu un crédit. Il l’a utilisé pour augmenter son stock de farine. Il espère produire plus de pains et augmenter ses revenus.
texts.en: Joseph, aged 47, is married and owns a bakery. And he sells flour. After taking some action, he obtained a loan. He used it to increase his stock of flour. He hopes to produce more bread and augment his income.

loans.use: to increase his stock of flour

loans.name: Estone

texts.fr: Estone a 53 ans, elle est veuve, et elle a deux enfants. Elle revend de la vaisselle et d'autres ustensiles ménagers. Elle demande un microcrédit pour agrandir son activité. Elle a déjà bénéficié de prêts dans le passé ce qui lui a permis d'améliorer son commerce.
texts.en:
Estone is a 53-year-old widow with two children. She sells dishes and other household utensils.

She is requesting a micro loan to grow her business. She has received loans in the past, which allowed her to improve her business.

loans.use: to purchase household utensils.

loans.name: Simone

texts.fr: Simone a 38 ans, elle est mariée et elle a six enfants qui sont scolarisés. Elle vend des produits alimentaires depuis sept ans. Afin d’éviter une rupture de stock, elle demande un microcrédit qui lui permettra d’acheter plus de marchandises. A l'avenir, elle espère développer son activité et gagner des revenus plus élevés.
texts.en:
Simone is 38 years old, married, and she has six children who are or have been enrolled in school. She has been selling foodstuffs for seven years.

In order to avoid running out of items, Simone is requesting a small loan which will allow her to buy more merchandise. In future, she hopes to develop her business and earn more income.

loans.use: to grow her inventory.

loans.name: Floriette

texts.fr: Floriette a 28 ans, elle est célibataire et elle n’a pas encore d’enfant. Depuis l’âge de 18 ans, elle gère sa propre activité. Elle revend des produits alimentaires et elle souhaite devenir une grande commerçante. Elle demande un microcrédit pour augmenter son stock de marchandises et à l'avenir elle espère développer son activité.
texts.en:
Floriette is 28 years old, single and does not yet have any children. She has been running her own business since the age of 18. She sells food products and would like to own a large store.

She is requesting a micro loan to increase her stock of goods, and hopes to expand her business in the future.

loans.use: to purchase cartons of eggs and bags of golden yellow sugar.

loans.name: Celissa

texts.fr: Celissa est âgé de 60 ans. Il est divorcé et vit seul. Il revend des boissons gazeuses afin de trouver de quoi répondre à ses besoins. Il voudrait avoir un crédit pour acheter plus de stock. A l’avenir, il compte ajouter des produits alimentaires dans son activité.
texts.en: Celissa is 60 years old. He is divorced and lives alone. He sells fizzy drinks in order to cover his needs. He would like a small loan to buy more stock. In future, he intends to add foodstuffs to his business.

loans.use: to buy some crates of soft drinks.

loans.name: Mavluda

texts.ru: Мавлуде 37 лет. Она мать двоих детей. У нее 14 и 15 летные дочки. Они учатся в средней школе. Мавлуда серьезная и заботливая мать. Она жизнелюбивая женщина. Мавлуда 3 года назад решила зарабатывать и помочь мужу обеспечить семью.  Она занимается портнихой. Мавлуда научилась  у  тете. Сегодня у нее имеется больше клиенты. Она в день шьет 2 национальное платье за 40-50 TJS. Мавлуда хочет отремонтировать свой дом и улучшить жилищные условия семью. Ей не хватает денег для купли стройматериалы и по этой причине обратилась за кредитом. Мавлуде нужно Ваша поддержка.
texts.en:
Mavluda is 37 and has two children, daughters aged 14 and 15 who are both in school. She is a serious and caring mother and a cheerful woman. Three years ago, she decided to earn money and help her husband provide for the family. She works as a seamstress, a skill she learned from her aunt. Now she has many customers and can sew two traditional dresses in a day, for 40 to 50 TJS. 

Mavluda wants to renovate her home and improve her family's living conditions. She doesn't have the money to buy building materials and for this reason is looking for a loan. She needs your support.

loans.use: to purchase building materials

loans.name: Varduhi

texts.en:
Varduhi is 28 years old. She lives in the city of Vanadzor in the Lori region. She lives there with her aunt. Varduhi has higher theatrical education, but she never managed to work in her desired profession. For several years, she worked at the military unit as a cook. She works as a restaurant cook/waitress.

Varduhi mentioned that she greatly likes the profession of art, but the work of cooking she also finds interesting and creative. She also decorates the tables for different parties, and she does it very nicely and cutely.

This loan of 300,000 Armenian drams she decided to use for the purchase of a computer, which will help her gain awareness of all the innovations in the sphere of table designing and party organization activities.

loans.use: to purchase a computer, which will help her learn about all the innovations in the sphere of table designing and party organization activities.

loans.name: Fridah

texts.en:
Fridah is a married woman. She has five children. She describes herself as honest. She operates a retail business where she sells sugar, flour, cooking oil, sugar and other items. She has been involved in this business for 10 years. Her primary customers are locals. She describes her biggest business challenge to be low stock.

She will use the KES 70,000 loan to buy more stock of sugar, flour, cooking oil and other items. This is her third loan with SMEP Microfinance Bank. Previous loans were repaid successfully. She will use the anticipated profits to pay school fees.

loans.use: to buy more stock of sugar, flour, cooking oil and other items

loans.name: Jesus Alberto

texts.es:
A los 22 años de edad, Jesús se vio en la necesidad de dejar sus estudios para ayudar económicamente a su madre en el hogar. Fue donde decidió alquilar un carrito de hot dogs para salir a vender a la calle. Tiempo después, fue ahorrando hasta comprar su propio carrito de hot dogs y empezar un trabajo más arduo para generar mayores ingresos en el hogar. 
Ahora Jesús ya tiene 26 años de edad y sueña con regresar a estudiar, pero antes tiene con objetivo hacer crecer su negocio y así poder costear su educación. Razón por la cual desea invertir ahorita solicitando un préstamo para comprar pan, salchichas, salsas, chile y repollo al por mayor y así poder ahorrar en la compra, para obtener mayores ingresos. En sus planes está comprar o alquilar un establecimiento en un mercado, para así dejar de vender de forma ambulante.
texts.en:
At the age of 22 Jesus needed to leave school to help his mother financially at home. That was when he decided to rent a hot dog cart to go sell on the street. Some time afterward, he saved up to buy his own hot dog cart and started on the harder task of earning more income for the household.

Now Jesus is 26 years old and dreams of going back to school, but first his objective is to make his business grow so he'll be able to afford his education. This is why he wants to invest now by applying for a loan to buy bread, sausages, condiments, hot sauce and cabbage wholesale so he can save money on the purchase and earn more income.

His plans are to buy or rent a location at the marketplace so he can stop being a street vendor.

loans.use: To buy bread, sausages, condiments, hot sauce, and cabbage.

loans.name: Naomie

texts.fr: Naomie a 34 ans. Elle est célibataire et elle vend des produits alimentaires : tomates, beurre, et d’autres ingrédients. Elle vend également des boissons gazeuses. Elle demande un microcrédit pour augmenter son stock. Grâce à ce microcrédit, elle évite les ruptures de stock et elle répond aux besoins de sa clientèle.
texts.en: Naomie is 34 years old and unmarried. She sells grocery items: tomatoes, butter, and other ingredients. She also sells fizzy drinks. She is asking for a micro-loan to increase her stock of goods. Thanks to micro-loans, she is avoiding inventory shortages, and she is responding to the needs of her customers.

loans.use: to purchase a stock of spaghetti, rice, and oil

loans.name: Khursheed

texts.en:
Khursheed is a hardworking woman. She has been successfully running a business selling bed sheets and bedspreads for many years. She always has a good collection to offer and has attained a regular list of customers.

She wants to grow her business, so she requested a loan of 40,000 PKR to buy bundles of bed sheets and bedspreads in different colors and designs. It will help her to inflate her sales. She wishes to spend part of her revenues on her family expenses. She also wants to increase her business capital.

loans.use: to buy bundles of bed sheets and bedspreads in different colors and designs.

loans.name: Sivelia

texts.fr: Sivelia, 30 ans, vit en union libre. Elle a un enfant. Elle revend des produits de lessives et, parfois, des produits alimentaires. Elle mène cette activité afin de gagner de quoi faire vivre sa famille. Elle demande un prêt pour acheter des gallons de détergents.
texts.en: Sivelia, 30 years old, lives in a common-law marriage. She has one child. She sells laundry detergents and sometimes, foodstuffs. She works at this business in order to earn enough to support her family. She is asking for a loan to buy some gallons of detergent.

loans.use: to buy some gallons of detergent.

loans.name: Elsa Dolores

texts.en:
Namaste is pleased to introduce you to its client Elsa Dolores, an outstanding 54 year-old entrepreneur. Elsa is married, with a fifth grade education, and has grown children who no longer live at home. She lives in the town of Guardianía del Hato, Sacatepéquez, Guatemala. Her main business is making and selling tortillas.   
Elsa is starting her fourth loan cycle with Namaste.  When she started with Namaste she had a monthly net profit of 5734 Guatemalan Quetzales making tortillas on a wood stove and selling them out of her home. Now, 27 months later, she has completed the three cycles of the Namaste Basic Business Development Program and has had many hours of instruction in how to manage a business.  She has also worked for all these months with a Business Advisor who has given her advice on what she can do to grow her business. With each cycle she received a slightly larger loan, which she invested in her business with the guidance of her business advisor.  Her monthly net profit at the end of these three nine-month cycles had increased to 11726 Guatemalan Quetzales.
Through the training and business advice that she has received she has grown her business to the point where she now has four employees, several gas stoves and sells her tortillas in two different locations, one on the main street of her town.  She buys her corn in bulk and what she doesn’t use she sells in small quantities to other women who make tortillas. She now sells fruits, vegetables and eggs, items that her customers have requested from her.  And on the weekends, she makes tamales.  She has also started saving for her old age.  She is concerned about the time when she may no longer be able to work.
The fourth cycle that Elsa is now entering is a Namaste pilot program for women who have the potential to grow their businesses beyond what they accomplished through the three cycles of the Basic Business Development Program, to the point of creating jobs for others in their communities.  She will receive even more education and advice and an even larger loan. She wants to expand all aspects of her business, buy her own vehicle so that she can more easily and less expensively transport both raw materials and her final products, and continue saving for the future.  She hopes to increase her monthly net profits to 20717 Guatemalan Quetzales during this cycle.

loans.use: buy her own vehicle so that she can more easily and less expensively transport both raw materials and her final products

loans.name: Priscien

texts.fr: Priscien a 35 ans, il est marié et père d’un enfant qui est scolarisé. Il a ouvert une quincaillerie il y a trois ans pour répondre aux demandes de sa clientèle qui veut acheter des matériaux de construction. Grâce à cette activité, il arrive à prendre soin de sa famille. Très jeune et commerçant dévoué, Priscien désire agrandir son commerce et s’offrir de meilleures conditions de vie. Il demande un microcrédit pour augmenter son stock.
texts.en:
Priscien is 35 years old. He is married and the father of a child who is enrolled in school. He opened a hardware shop three years ago so as to respond to the needs of his clientele who wish to buy construction materials. Thanks to this business, he supports his family.

A very young and passionate businessman, Priscien wants to grow his business and be able to afford better living conditions. He is asking for a small loan so as to grow his stock.

loans.use: to buy iron bars and PCV pipes.

loans.name: St Firmin Estella

texts.fr: Estella, 45 ans, est veuve. Elle vit avec ses trois enfants. Pour gagner sa vie, elle revend des produits alimentaires dans une petite boutique aménagée dans un coin de sa maison. Elle y vend du riz, du sucre, de la farine, du lait, du maïs, etc. Elle cherche un microcrédit pour augmenter son stock.
texts.en: Estella, aged 45, is a widow. She lives with her three children. To earn a living, she sells grocery items in a small shop fixed up in a corner of her house. There, she sells rice, sugar, flour, milk, cornmeal, etc. She is looking for a micro-loan to increase her inventory.

loans.use: to increase her stock of products

loans.name: Marie Jeanette

texts.fr: Jeanette a 57 ans, elle est mariée et elle a sept enfants. Elle gère un commerce dans lequel elle vend des haricots et des produits alimentaires. Elle exerce cette activité depuis quinze ans. Elle demande un microcrédit pour augmenter son stock de marchandises.
texts.en:
Jeanette is 57 years old and married. She has seven children and manages a business where she sells beans and grocery items. She has been in this business for fifteen years. She is asking for a micro-loan to increase her stock of merchandise.
Jeanette is 57 years old and married. She has seven children and manages a business where she sells beans and grocery items. She has been in this business for fifteen years. She is asking for a micro-loan to increase her stock of merchandise.

loans.use: to purchase sacks of beans

loans.name: Dushyigikirane Group

texts.en: Jean Marie Vianney is 46 years old and is married with three children who are between 3 and 8 years old. He is well-known for his selling boutique which he has had for about three years. Jean Marie Vianney is the president of this group DUSHYIGIKIRANE and this is his third cycle to request a loan from Vision Finance Company.  He is a good client and repaid his loans on time. He is the second person on the last line in white shirt. Jean Marie Vianney's hours at the selling boutique are from 6 a.m. to 7 p.m. every day. He wants to request a Kiva loan via Vision Finance Company to purchase various goods such as sugar, salt, cooking oil, rice, and bread for sale. With the profit from this loan, Jean Marie Vianney will be able to purchase enough food for the family, to buy new clothes for the children, to pay school fees for his children, and to buy medical insurance for his family.

loans.use: to purchase various goods such as sugar, salt, cooking oil, rice, and bread for sale.

loans.name: Marta Rosa

texts.es:
El instinto maternal, hizo a Marta trabajara fuerte por muchos años en una zona franca para sacar adelante a sus tres hijos, que gracias a ese esfuerzo ahora son profesionales. Tras ver a sus hijos avanzar, ella decidió emprender de forma independiente vendiendo comida los fines de semana y ropa todo el tiempo.
Ahora a sus 56 años de edad, ya lleva diez años con su negocio y se siente muy orgullosa por ello, siempre con la ayuda de sus hijas. Razón por la cual Marta ha decidido solicitar un préstamo para comprar ropa, zapatos y arroz, carnes, verduras, frijoles, entre otros ingredientes para la venta. Con esto podrá satisfacer a sus clientes que tiene por encargo y a los de la venta de comida. Entre sus planes está obtener un local fijo para vender sus productos.
texts.en:
The maternal instinct gave Marta the strength to work for many years in a duty-free area to support her three children, who are now professionals thanks to her efforts. After seeing her kids moving forward she decided to independently sell food on the weekends and clothes full-time.

Now at the age of 56, she's been at this business for ten years and is very proud of that. Her daughters have always helped her out. This is why Marta has decided to apply for a loan to buy clothes, shoes, rice, meat, produce, beans and more for her business. With these items she'll be able to meet the demand of the customers who order clothes and the customers who buy her food. 

Her plans are to acquire a fixed location where she could sell her products.

loans.use: To purchase clothes, shoes, rice, meat, produce, and beans amongst other things.

loans.name: Wilna

texts.fr: Wilna, 48 ans, est commerçante depuis  une dizaine d’année. Elle revend des vêtements usagés. Grace aux microcrédits, elle fait beaucoup de progrès dans son activité. Elle continue à solliciter du crédit car cela lui permet d’éviter des ruptures de stock. Elle souhaite ouvrir bientôt un compte d’épargne.
texts.en: Wilna, aged 48, has been a merchant for a dozen years. She sells secondhand clothing. Thanks to micro-loans, she has made a lot of progress in her business. She continues to request loans, since they enable her to avoid inventory shortages. Her wish is to open a savings account soon.

loans.use: to increase her stock of used clothing

loans.name: Ramzana

texts.en:
It was hard for Ramzana to manage her household expenses with the small income of her husband. She is a 51-year-old, married woman. She is a mother of five children. Some years ago she started her business, selling animals in her community. Her husband fully supports and assists her with her work.

Now, she has requested for a loan of 45,000 PKR. She wants to use this loan amount to purchase more cattle for reselling in the market. Ramzana has gained great confidence in the business, as she has learned how to deal with other individuals within the business, allowing her to feel empowered.

loans.use: to purchase more cattle for reselling in the market.

loans.name: Romeo

texts.en:
Romeo lives on a farm in Akhuryan village of Shirak region with his wife and two sons. Romeo's elder son helps him with the land cultivation work, and besides that, also runs a taxi. His younger son is a migrant worker. In the arable land near the house, Romeo cultivates potatoes as well as cabbage and carrots.

He requested this loan to purchase a ton of potato seeds to keep for spring planting season as well as fertilizer, so as to have a rich harvest next year. Current prices for seeds are low, so Romeo wants to make cost savings for the coming harvest season. He hopes for your support.

loans.use: to pay for a ton of potato seeds  to keep for spring planting season, as well as fertilizer, so as to have a rich harvest next year.

loans.name: Iqlimbonu

texts.en:
Agriculture is one of the most difficult jobs because it takes a lot of hard work to get ahead. Iqlimbonu has never given up due to bad weather or anything else. She is always ready to find a way to provide for her family.

Iqlimbonu is a wonderful woman. She is 48 and lives with her family in the Bohtar district. She gets up with the first rays of the sun and goes out to the field where she has responsibilities. She has her own plot of land where she grows vegetables.

Iqlimbonu wants to treat her land and crops with fertilizer to destroy microbes and insects. She needs your support to purchase fertilizer.

loans.use: to purchase mineral fertilizers.

loans.name: Fadi

texts.en:
Fadi is a 35-year-old married father of three and a Palestinian refugee who lives in a Palestinian refugee camp. Due to the low social and financial situations of Palestinians in Lebanon, almost three years ago he opened a grocery shop to better cover his family's needs and expenses.

Fadi is a hard worker and an ambitious man who is trying hard to develop his business and attract more customers. Today he is acquiring a loan from Kiva's field partner Al Majmoua to rent a bigger shop and increase his merchandise with new items and offers, which will help him satisfy his customers' demands.

Fadi hopes to expand his business more in the future to increase his income and improve his family's living conditions inside the camp.

loans.use: to rent a bigger shop and increase his merchandise with new items and offers

loans.name: Wilma

texts.en:
Wilma resides in Valencia, Bohol. She is 29 years old and has a barn where she raises hogs for a living. She also cultivates some land where she grows coconut trees. These trees produce coconuts that she can sell, which adds income for her family. Wilma is asking for a loan to buy fertilizer for her coconuts and feed for the hogs.

Wilma hopes that through her crops she can also contribute to the expenses of their household and help her husband earn a living for their family. In the future, Wilma plans to expand her hog-raising business and increase the number of her coconut trees for her family.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and feed.

loans.name: Vakhtang

texts.en:
Vakhtang is 57 years old, a married man from the small village of Zestaponi district. He lives with his pensioner wife. Vakhtang wants to purchase a milk cow and requested a loan. The Start Up program, which is a joint initiative with Kiva and Credo enables him to get a loan of 2000 GEL. With the received credit he will purchase a milk cow and, together with his wife, will produce dairy products.

Vakhtang had already had one Start Up loan and he awaits your support once more.

loans.use: to buy a milk cow.

loans.name: Alvard

texts.en:
Alvard lives with her husband, son, daughter-in-law, and three little grandchildren in Azatan ville, Shirak region. Currently, she has to take care of their family farm alone, because the family menfolk left for migrant work in a neighbouring country and her daughter-in-law has to take care of her little kids.

Due to her rich experience in farming, Alvard perfectly manages to handle all farming work and sustain the farm. She requested this loan to cover labor costs to harvest potatoes and transport them, cover rental costs for the the land, and purchase seeds for next spring planting season. This investment will really help Alvard and her farm to function well and continue providing income for family's living.

loans.use: to cover labor costs to harvest potatoes and transport them, cover rental costs for the arable land, and purchase seeds for next spring's planting season.

loans.name: Claudelphine

texts.fr:
Claudelphine est une femme souriante de 42 ans. Elle vit en ville avec son mari et ses 4 enfants. Pour nourrir sa famille, elle vend des tissus usagés près du rond-point de la ville depuis 15 ans. 
Avec ce prêt, elle compte acheter 1 balle de tissu friperie qu’elle va vendre en détail à ses clients. Elle espère conquérir d’autres nouveaux clients afin de gagner plus de bénéfices. Claudelphine va utiliser ses bénéfices pour assurer les dépenses familiales et constituer un peu d’épargne.
Son objectif est de devenir autonome financièrement.
texts.en:
Claudelphine is 42-year-old woman who is cheerful. She lives in town with her husband and her four children. To feed the family, she has been selling used fabrics near the town’s roundabout for fifteen years.

With this loan, she intends to purchase a bale of secondhand fabrics that she will sell retail to her customers. She hopes to win over new customers in order to earn more profit. Claudelphine is going to use her profits to ensure family expenses are covered and to build up some savings. Her goal is to become financially independent.

loans.use: to purchase a bale of used fabics

loans.name: Kasensero Twekulakulanye Group

texts.en:
Kasensero Twekulakulanye is a group located at Kasensero fishing site. It consists of five members who are known as being very active and aggressive in service delivery.  They all reside in Kasensero fishing village where they met due to a common interest to achieve their goals.  They deal in making fish nets, fish mongering, hotels, and bars. They work six days a week and each day they work for 12 hours plus.

Yosam is a member of this group operating a wholesale shop and fish trading; he started his business with fishing nets and added stock when his sales increased. His clients are traders from Congo at Bwera Uganda-Congo board where he trades in the market. He describes himself as honest and hard working man.

Yosam wishes to have a good relationship with UGAFODE MDI for further funding since his biggest challenge is lack of capital investment. His dream is to enlarge his business to the level of export, acquiring enough land for his family since other family members are farmers.

loans.use: to purchase fish nets

loans.name: Rosenie

texts.fr: Rosenie a 32 ans. Elle est mariée et elle a deux enfants qui sont scolarisés. Elle gère une activité dans laquelle elle vend des vêtements d’occasion depuis 4 ans. Elle demande un microcrédit pour développer son commerce et augmenter son stock. A l’avenir, elle souhaite offrir une bonne éducation à ses enfants.
texts.en: Rosenie is 32 years old and married. She has two children in school. For four years, she has been running a business where she sells secondhand clothing. She is asking for a micro-loan to develop her commerce and increase her inventory. For the future, her wish is to provide a good education for her children.

loans.use: to purchase a stock of secondhand clothing

loans.name: Santa Elena Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado Santa Elena  está esforzándose por poder mejorar las condiciones de vida de cada una de las integrantes, son 24 mujeres que quiere lo mejor para sus familias, y es por ello que ponen todo lo mejor de sí.
La señora Angelica es miembro de este grupo, ayuda al Sostenimiento de su familia por medio de la venta de frutas de estación en el mercado. Tiene muy buena clientela que siempre compra de ella las frutas que vende  y es por medio de sus ventas que tiene los medios para poder ayudar a su familia.
Pide este préstamo para poder comprar frutas frescas de estación, de manera a poder seguir con sus esfuerzos como lo viene haciendo.
texts.en:
The group called Santa Elena is striving to improve the life conditions of each and every one of its members. They are 25 women who want the best for their families. It is for this reason that they put all of themselves into their efforts.

Miss Angelica is a member of this group. She helps support her family by means of selling seasonal fruits in the market. She has very good clientele who always buy fruits from her and it is through her sales that she has the means to help her family.

She is requesting this loan to be able to buy fresh seasonal fruits, so she can continue with her efforts as she has been doing.

loans.use: to buy fresh fruits to sell.

loans.name: Mujeres Luchadoras 2 Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado “Mujeres Luchadoras 2” está en su ciclo 26  del programa de comité de mujeres, es un antiguo grupo que siempre ha trabajado de manera unida, ellas están dentro del programa de eliminación de la pobreza, esforzándose por mejorar sus condiciones de vida.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Dominga quien gracias a su sacrificio y lucha diaria, se viene ganando la vida, de una manera digna y honesta. Ella se dedica a la elaboración y venta de empanadas, que se encarga de hacer ella misma, y que después sale a vender de manera ambulante.
Pide este préstamo ya que quiere comprar insumos para poder hacer sus empanadas, como ser carne, condimentos, hortalizas, y otros, y de esa forma seguir deleitando a sus clientes, y también procurarse los medios para poder seguir ayudando a su familia.
texts.en:
The group named Mujeres Luchadores 2 is in their 26th cycle of the Women's Committee Program. It is an old group that has worked in a unified manner. They are in the "Poverty Stoplight" program, and are striving to improve their living conditions.

One of the members is Dominga, who, thanks to her sacrifice and daily persistence is earning a living in a worthy and honest way. She earns a living preparing and selling empanadas, which she makes herself and then goes out to sell as a street vendor.

She is requesting a loan because she wants to buy supplies to be able to make empanadas such as meat, condiments, vegetables and other items. In this way she can continue pleasing her customers and also obtain the means to keep helping her family.

loans.use: to buy supplies to make empanadas such as meat, condiments, vegetables and other items.

loans.name: Ana Maria

texts.es:
La socia continúa perteneciendo al banco comunal “YANAHUARA SEÑOR DE TORRECHAYOC”.

La socia Ana María sigue dedicándose a vender comida, en este caso salchipapas. Esta labor hace que ella trabaje toda la tarde y se queda hasta terminar todo lo que prepara día a día. Con este negocio sale adelante desde hace ya  muchos años, es por eso que tiene clientes files a ella.
La socia solicito el crédito para comprar papas y mayonesa, ya que con estos ingredientes ella podrá ofrecer mejor su producto y a la vez aportar más a su hogar.

La socia esta agradecida y contenta con el crédito dado, y se compromete a ser puntual en sus pagos de sus cuotas.
texts.en:
Ana Maria is still a member of the community bank "Yanahuara Senor De Torrechayoc".

She continues to work in food sales, in this case a sausage and potatoes dish. This job has her working every evening and she stays until she finishes preparing everything, day after day. This business has enabled her to get by for many years, and that's why she has loyal customers.

She's applying for a loan to purchase potatoes and mayonnaise, because with these ingredients she'll be able to better sell her dishes and also contribute more to her household. She's grateful and happy with the loan she received and is committed to being punctual with her payments.

loans.use: To purchase potatoes and mayonnaise.

loans.name: Khosrov

texts.en:
Khosrov lives with his wife in Vayk town. Like other local people in the town, Khosrov also earns his living with a livestock-keeping business. His current livestock includes two cows, two calves, and an ox. Khosrov works hard to sustain the livestock and gather income for his family.

Khosrov sells mostly milk, processed dairy items, eggs, and sometimes the cattle as well. He requested this loan to purchase a cow, a calf, and forage for feeding the livestock during the winter. He hopes to receive lenders' support and continue developing his agricultural business.

loans.use: to pay for a cow, a calf and forage for feeding the livestock during the winter.

loans.name: Jaquline

texts.en:
Jaquline is a married woman. She has four children. She describes herself to be ambitious. She operates a retail business where she sells beauty products. She has been involved in this business for three years. Her business is located in a good area and her primary customers are locals. She describes her biggest business challenge to be inadequate working capital.

She will use the KES 50,000 loan to buy more stock of beauty products. She hopes that in the future, she will educate her children to university level. This is her third loan with SMEP Microfinance Bank. Previous loans were repaid successfully. She will use the anticipated profits to set up a salon.

loans.use: to buy more stock of beauty products

loans.name: Kishwar

texts.en:
Kishwar is 39 years old, a married woman, and a mother of four children. She is working hard to fulfill their demands, including food, health, clothing, and education. She with her husband has been doing work of agriculture for some years. They crop different vegetables and fruits and sell them in the local market. She has gradually improved her business with the support of Kashf Foundation.

In order to purchase different types of seeds with the packs of insecticides and pesticides, currently Kishwar has applied a loan of 50,000 PKR. This will help her to grow more crops, which ultimately helps in generating more cash.

loans.use: to purchase different types of seeds with the packs of insecticides and pesticides.

loans.name: Lasha

texts.en:
Lasha is a 25-year-old married man. He lives with his wife, parents and pensioner grandmother in Ozurgeti District. The family is involved in agricultural activities. In particular, they have a cow and a plot of agricultural land, where they grow maize and nut trees. Lasha is a very hardworking man and does his best with his family members to insure a good harvest.

Lasha decided to start a trading business and requested a loan. The Start Up program, which is a joint initiative with Kiva and Credo, enables him to get a loan of 1500 GEL. With the received credit he will purchase a stock of honey and will resell at higher prices. This will increase his family income and with increased income Lasha will provide better living conditions for his family. He awaits your support.

loans.use: to begin to trade honey.

loans.name: San Ramon Group

texts.es:
El comité de Mujeres lleva por nombre SAN RAMON inician este ciclo con el entusiasmo de seguir progresando y beneficiar a sus familias. Asumen la responsabilidad de ayudarse las unas a las otras, para poder mejorar sus condiciones de vida.
La Señora Nidia es una de las integrantes,  ella se dedica a la elaboración y venta de comidas de todo tipo, comenta que por medio de la elaboración de sus comidas ayuda a su familia y tiene los medios necesarios para poder procurar una vida digna para su familia.
Pide este préstamo para la compra de insumos para seguir haciendo sus comidas, como ser verduras, carne, condimentos, hortalizas y otros. Agradece por la oportunidad que recibe de poder seguir mejorando cada día.
texts.en:
This women's committee goes by the name SAN RAMON and is beginning this cycle with the enthusiasm to continue progressing and benefiting their families. They take it upon themselves to help each other in order to improve their quality of life.

Nidia is one of the members; she makes a living making and selling all kinds of food. She says that by working she is able to help her family and she has the necessary means to create a dignified life for her family.

Nidia is requesting this loan to buy supplies to continue making her meals, including vegetables, meat, spices, and greens, among others. She is grateful for the opportunity to continue improving each day.

loans.use: to buy ingredients to make food to sell including vegetables, condiments, and greens, among others.

loans.name: Jocelyn

texts.en:
Jocelyn is a 39-year-old married woman from the community of Dimiao, Bohol. She has six children aged six to eighteen. She works hard for them, together with her husband who is a carpenter.

She is raising hogs and she also makes and produce skewer or barbecue stick. She is asking a loan to buy feed for her hogs and bamboo for her skewer. Jocelyn hopes to increase her income with the loan’s help. Her profit will be primarily for her children’s school fees.

loans.use: to buy feed for her hogs and bamboo for her skewer

loans.name: Cristina

texts.en:
Cristina runs a sari-sari (variety) store, selling various commodities in her place in Ormoc City, Leyte. She sell items such as eggs, flour, sugar, condiments, powdered milk, and toiletries. She also raises hogs. She is 35 years old, married, and has four children, ages two to twelve.

She is asking for a loan to buy toothpaste, shampoo, insect repellent, canned sardines, seasoning, detergent powder, soy sauce, vinegar, and bath soap. With these, her store will be filled with a variety of stock and will attract more customers. This will help her to improve her income and be able to manage her finances.

Cristina is hoping that she will be able to expand her sari-sari store inventory and become more sustainable.

loans.use: to buy toothpaste, shampoo, insect repellent, canned sardines, seasoning, detergent powder, soy sauce, vinegar, and bath soap.

loans.name: Sergia

texts.en:
Sergia is a 48-year-old woman. She is married and her husband works as a security guard. She is a sari-sari store owner and she also sells Arthur’s detox products. Sergia supports two children, aged 16 and 19.

She worries because, sometimes, she is struggling with her finances, due to expensive school fees. She is in need of additional capital to restock her store and make her business more attractive to her customers.

Sergia is asking for a loan to buy soft drinks, canned goods, and Arthur’s detox products.

Once her business is back on track, she can save again for the payment of daily household expenses and even school fees.

loans.use: to buy soft drinks, canned goods, and Arthur’s detox products.

loans.name: Varujan

texts.en:
Varujan is a taxi driver from Litchk village, in the Syunik region. He lives with his wife, who has been involved in livestock breeding.

The income from Varujan's taxi driving is very important for the family and he currently needs support. He requested this loan to purchase gas installation for cost savings, to purchase winter tires, and to partially renovate the engine of the car. This investment will greatly help him to make some cost savings and gather more income.

loans.use: to pay for gas installation for cost savings, to purchase winter tires, and to partially renovate the engine of the car.

loans.name: Bibizulfiya

texts.ru: Бибизулфия замужняя женщина и мать в возрасте 56 лет. Ее муж, как и многие мужчины районов и сел оставил свою семью и уехал на заработки в заграницу, чтобы прокормить детей и жену. Бибизулфия всеми домашними делами занимается одна. Бибизулфия выращивает скотов и дома занимается животноводством. Сейчас денежные переводы сократились и ей необходимо увеличить доход от животноводческой деятельности, чтобы покрыть расходы. Она намерена купить еще пару голов телят, откормить их и после продать с наценкой. У нее имеется все условия для такого бизнеса. Бибизулфия не хватает денежных средств, и она надеется, что благодаря кредиту она осуществит свой план.
texts.en: Bibizulfiya is a 56-year-old married woman and mother. Her husband, just like many men from the districts and villages left his family to work abroad in order to provide for the children and wife. Bibizulfiya handles all the household work by herself. Bibizulfiya raises livestock and is involved in animal husbandry at home. Now that the money wires from her husband have decreased, she has to increase her income from the animal husbandry business to cover her expenses. She intends to buy a couple more calves, fatten them up and then resell them with a markup. She has all the necessary conditions for this business. Bibizulfiya is short on money and hopes that, thanks to this loan, she will realize her plan.

loans.use: to buy a couple more calves in order to increase her business income

loans.name: Berdi

texts.ru: Берди 56 лет, женат и имеет 8 детей. Он крестьянин, который выращивает различные овощные культуры. Несмотря на свой возраст, он все еще трудится, чтобы помогать своим детям. Эта деятельность позволила ему обеспечить свою семью, продвинуться вперед и зарабатывать себе на жизнь честным трудом. Берди очень доволен, так как его дети всегда поддерживают его. Его жена тоже помогает ему и одновременно занимается скотоводством. Берди обратился за кредитом, чтобы купить семена картошки и минеральные удобрения для обработки земли. Он очень верит в Вас.
texts.en: Berdi is 56 years old, married and has 8 children. He is a peasant, who grows various vegetable crops. Despite his age, he still works in order to help his children. This business allowed him to provide for his family, advance himself and earn a living with an honest labor. Berdi is very happy because his children always support him. His wife also helps him and concurrently involved in animal husbandry. Berdi requested this loan to buy potato seeds and mineral fertilizers to cultivate the land. He truly believes in You.

loans.use: to buy potato seeds and mineral fertilizers to cultivate the land

loans.name: Loreta

texts.en:
Loreta is from Ormoc City, Leyte. She is 63 years old, and this business supports her needs, since her children are on their own. This kind of store is simply attached to her house.

Loreta sells items such as noodles, canned goods, and items in sachets such as coffee, shampoo, bath soap, detergent powder, and chips. She is asking for a loan to buy boxes of canned food, rice, and snacks.

In the future, she aspire to improve her livelihood and expand her business for better revenue.

loans.use: to buy canned food, rice, and snacks.

loans.name: Luzviminda

texts.en:
Luzviminda is a resourceful woman. She is 50 years old and raises hogs for a living. She is from Ormoc City, Leyte.

Even without a proper barn, she makes use of the shade of the tree so she can raise her sow and piglets. She works hard because of her 11-year-old son.

Luzviminda is asking for a loan to finance her need for feed to fatten her hogs. The loan will really help her because she has a sow and piglets to look after.

Her priority will be the school fees of her son and her family’s food consumption.

loans.use: to buy feed for her pigs.

loans.name: Primitivo

texts.es:
El Sr. Primitivo es de la ciudad de Lambaré, propietario de un taller de confecciones de trajes en general. Tiene mucha experiencia y antigüedad en el rubro y una clientela bien formada que siempre va hasta su taller.
Comenta que se fue abriendo camino con sacrifico y traba-jo duro y que hoy ya es muy conocido.
Pide este préstamo para poder comprar telas en cantidad para poder seguir con sus confecciones.
texts.en:
Primitivo is from the city of Lambaré and he is the owner of a sewing workshop that makes suits in general. He has a lot of experience and seniority in the profession and a well formed clientele that always goes to his shop.

He tells us that he started paving a path for himself through sacrifice and hard work and that today he is very well known.

He is requesting this loan to be able to buy fabrics in bulk to be able to continue to sew.

loans.use: to buy fabrics in bulk

loans.name: Edna

texts.en:
Edna is a happy woman, and this positive attitude that she possesses makes her good for business. Edna is 40 years old. She has a nineteen-year-old son.

She sells dried fish, snacks , fruits, and cooked dishes. She is also engaged in direct selling of personal collection products such as powdered detergent, fabric conditioner, and lotion.

She is asking for a loan to buy more lanzones, dried fish, detergent powder, baby bath, and fabric conditioner.

Edna hope to become successful in her business and to continue make improvements in order to prosper.

loans.use: to buy lanzones (a kind of fruit), dried fish, detergent powder, baby bath, and fabric conditioner.

loans.name: Victorino

texts.en:
Victorino is 52 years old. He lives in Garcia Hernandez, Bohol. Victorino is engaged in planting and harvesting rice for sale and for family use. He also grows vegetables.

His farm is still doing well. However, he needs financial assistance to improve it. Recently, he took a new loan to buy fertilizer, insecticides, and seeds.

He plans to use the additional revenue generated from his farm to better provide for his wife, since his children are already adults. They will use the income to buy healthy food and save for future needs.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, insecticides, and seeds.

loans.name: Armine

texts.en:
Armine is a hardworking and enthusiastic farmer from Sevqar village of Tavush region. She lives with her husband and three children; all of them attend the local village school.

Armine's farm is rich with livestock. Her income mainly comes from selling products such as milk, dairy products, other produce, meat, eggs, and sometimes cattle in the local markets. Armine is devoted to her farm and does her best to gain income for the family's living costs.

The requested loan will help her to purchase a truck needed for her farm. This will be a big support to her farming business, and Armine hopes for lenders' support.

loans.use: to pay for a truck needed for her farm.

loans.name: Baktygul

texts.ru: Бактыгул, 34 года, замужем, мать 4 детей. У нее - средне-специальное образование, работает в Войсковой части делопроизводителем. Ее заработная плата составляет 15,000 сом (KGS). Бактыгул обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 143,000 сом (KGS) на утепление квартиры. Доходы она и дальше планирует вкладывать в улучшение жилищных условий, а также в образование ее детей- школьников.
texts.en: Baktygul is 34 years old, married and a mother of 4 children. She has a specialized secondary education and works as a clerk at a military base. Her salary amounts to 15,000 som (KGS). Baktygul requested a loan in the amount of 143,000 som (KGS) from the Bai Tushum Bank to insulate her apartment. She plans to invest the earnings into further improving her living conditions and also educating her school-age children.

loans.use: to insulate her house in order to improve her living conditions

loans.name: Arminio

texts.es:
El Sr. Arminio tiene 49 años, está casado y tiene 2 hijos, por quienes él y su esposa se esfuerzan para poder crecer y salir adelante. Él se dedica a prestar servicios en un transporte de pasajeros, tiene un ómnibus que hace trabajar.
Es señor muy trabajador, excelente que se esfuerza por poder crecer cada día.
Pide este préstamo para poder comprar repuestos para su ómnibus y después de esa forma poder seguir con su trabajo.
texts.en:
Mr. Arminio is 49 years old, married, and has 2 children. He and his wife work very hard so their children can grow and succeed. He works providing transportation services for passengers. He has a bus that allows him to work.

Arminio is a very hard-working man, and it is excellent that he exerts himself to be able to grow each day.

He is requesting this loan to be able to buy spare parts for his bus, which will enable him to continue with his work.

loans.use: to buy spare parts to repair a bus.

loans.name: Luz

texts.es:
Luz es dueña de un local salón de belleza con servicios de manicura, pedicuro, maquillaje y peluquería, está separada tiene dos hijos menores por quienes ella se esfuerza para poder darles una mejor calidad de vida.
Es una persona  muy trabajadora y emprendedora, con buenas referencias que ha crecido por medio de su esfuerzo y lucha. Pide este préstamo para poder comprar insumos para su peluquería, como ser tintes, cremas, shampoo, enjuagues y otros, de manera a poder seguir dando un buen servicio a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Luz is the owner of a local beauty salon that offers manicures, pedicures, makeup, and hairstyling. She is separated and has two young children for whom she works hard so she can give them a better quality of life.

She is a very hardworking and entrepreneurial woman with good references who has grown through her hard work and effort. She is requesting this loan to buy supplies for her hair salon, such as dyes, creams, shampoos, rinses, and other items, so she can keep providing her customers with good service.

loans.use: to buy supplies for her beauty salon, such as dyes, creams, shampoos, rinses, and other items.

loans.name: Emelita

texts.en:
Emelita is a woman of strength. At 61, she is operating a business of RTW (ready-to-wear) clothing in Garcia Hernandez, Bohol. She sells shirts, pants, infants' wear, and also jewelry. She started this business two years ago and find this worth investing in.

She is asking for a loan to buy more clothes to sell such as infants' wear, t-shirts, pants, shorts, and jewelry. Emelita hope to expand her business and make it more sustainable so she can live comfortable in her old age. Her two children are both adults.

loans.use: to buy more clothes to sell such as infants' wear, t-shirts, pants, shorts, and jewelry.

loans.name: Albert

texts.fr:
Albert est un jeune homme dynamique de 31 ans.  Il est marié avec 2 enfants à charge. Il habite en ville depuis qu’il s’est marié et exerce une activité de vente d’œufs en ambulant auprès des épiceries de la ville.
Albert a déjà pris des prêts auparavant pour renforcer le capital de son vente d’œufs. Il a constaté une amélioration de sa condition de vie grâce à l’augmentation des bénéfices obtenus. Il constate aussi qu’il peut encore vendre plus d’œufs et va prendre un autre prêt pour augmenter de nouveau l’argent à utiliser. Il va acheter 2000 œufs qu’il arrivera à vendre en 2 jours seulement.
Il espère gagner beaucoup de bénéfices afin de constituer de l’épargne pour faire face aux imprévus et réaliser des projets d’avenir.
texts.en:
Albert is an energetic 31-year old man.  He is married and has two dependent children. Since getting married, he lives in town and sells eggs as an itinerant vendor to grocery stores. Albert already had prior loans to bolster his working capital. He says his life conditions have improved thanks to an increased revenue. He also says that he could sell even more eggs, and will be taking out another loan to increase his cash flow. 

He will buy 2,000 eggs and counts on being able to to sell them just two days. He hopes to earn a good revenue in order to grow his savings for emergencies as well as future projects.

loans.use: to buy ,2000 eggs for resale.

loans.name: Antonio

texts.en:
As a father of four children, Antonio strives to provide for them. He raises hogs and chicken. He is also into selling fresh fish. This has been his livelihood for 12 years now.

Most days as he sells fish, his wife helps him in looking after the hogs. He is asking for a loan to buy more fresh fish and feed for the hogs and chicken.

Antonio is motivated to work hard so his four children, aged two to fourteen, can eat healthy meals and attend their school.

loans.use: to buy fresh fish and feed for the hogs and chicken

loans.name: Mercedes

texts.es:
La señora Mercedes de 52 años de edad es comerciante y su esposo es el señor Juan, contratista de obras, ellos ya viven solos sus hijos son mayores a quienes por medio de su sacrificio sacaron adelante.
Mercedes hace 24 años que tiene su despensa comenta que empezó contando con pocos productos, luego con el transcurrir de los años y gracias a su esfuerzo ha ido creciendo. 
Pide este préstamo para poder comprar artículos de mercería, para poder ampliar más su despensa, y captar más clientela.
texts.en:
Mercedes is 52 years old and a businesswoman. Her husband Juan is a building contractor. They live on their own now that their children are independent and through their sacrifice, have gotten ahead.

Mercedes has had her store for 24 years and she comments that she began with very few products, and then as the years passed and thanks to her efforts, her business has grown.

She is requesting this loan to be able to purchase merchandise in order to expand her store more and interest more customers.

loans.use: to purchase merchandise to expand her store.

loans.name: Maria

texts.es:
Maria es de la ciudad de Encarnación, ella está estudiando la carrera de licenciatura en humanidades, y por medio de sus estudios quiere poder abrirse camino para poder mejorar sus condiciones de vida.
Está en el segundo año de la carrera, y pone su mayor esfuerzo para poder cumplir con su meta de ser alguien en la vida.
Pide este préstamo para poder pagar las cuotas de su carrera, y de esa forma poder seguir con sus estudios como lo viene haciendo.
texts.en:
Maria is from the city of Encarnación, She is studying for a degree in humanities, and through her studies, she wants to to set herself up to be able to improve her living conditions.

She is currently in the second year of her degree, and is working her hardest to achieve her goal to be somebody in life.

She is requesting this loan to pay her university fees, so that she can continue studying as she has been doing until now.

loans.use: to pay the fees for her degree.

loans.name: Ahmad

texts.en: Ahmad is a 36-year-old married man who has chosen to blur his face in the photo for personal reasons. He lives with his wife and two school-aged children, and he has operated a Mini Market since 2011.  He is a very hard worker and does not tire of work since his aim is to develop it and benefit from it. Today, he is requesting to borrow a loan from Kiva's partner Vitas s.a.l. to pay his children’s school fees. In the future, he plans to request more Kiva loans and help them continue their education.

loans.use: to pay his children’s school fees.

loans.name: Anna

texts.en:
Anna is 35 years old and she lives in Vanadzor city in Lori region.

Anna is married and she has a son. She has a vocational education with the specialty of nursing. For 10 years already she has rented a space in a beauty salon and here she works as a cosmetologist. She does make up, facial massages and makes special softening and nourishing facial masks.

Anna works very cutely and with high professionalism, and she has a really great number of customers who have to arrange their visit long beforehand .

Anna’s work is the only source of income for her family. Her husband has no constant work and he does hired constructional work. This loan of 500,000 Armenian drams is very important for Anna since she wants to buy some cosmetics for her make up activities, an epilator, a special machine for facial massage and also some products for preparing facial masks.

loans.use: to buy some cosmetics for her make up activities, an epilator, a special machine for facial massage and also some products for preparing facial masks.

loans.name: Dayal

texts.en:
Dayal is a 34-year-old married Lebanese woman. She lives with her husband and two children. Her husband is an employee in a local company, and he works hard to collect enough money to be able to pay the heavy expenses of life.

Today, Dayal is applying for a youth loan from Kiva partner Vitas s.a.l to pay her children’s school fees. She is very happy and eager always to borrow additional loans to help her children continue their education.

loans.use: to pay her children’s school fees.

loans.name: Mario Fernando

texts.es: Mario tiene 29 años de edad, es de estado civil soltero, tiene una hija, la pequeña Andrea de seis años de edad, Mario es una persona muy responsable y dedicada con su trabajo, pues se dedica la mayoria de tiempo en sus sembrios para darle lo necesario a su niña. El se dedica a la agricultura hace 11 años, solicita el crédito para la siembra y cultivo de papas y así obtener ganancias para seguir cumpliendo con su responsabilidad de padre.
texts.en:
Mario is 29 years old and single. He has one daughter, Andrea, who is six years old. Mario is a very responsible person and is dedicated to his job. He spends the majority of his time with his crops in order to provide the necessities for his daughter. He has worked in agriculture for 11 years.

He is requesting this loan in order to plant and cultivate potatoes and thus, obtain income to continue completing his responsibilities as a father.

loans.use: to plant and sell potatoes.

loans.name: Gajapersad

texts.en:
Gajapersad is 27 years old and lives together with his parents, wife and child. Because of cutbacks, he has been fired from a banana company where he worked as a field worker.

Gajapersad now wants to breed ducks and chickens for resale. He has already built his loft and has a few ducks. He wants to buy more, and for this he needs a loan of SRD 1,000.

loans.use: to buy ducks and chickens for resale.

loans.name: Fatima

texts.es:
Fatima está estudiando la carrera de Derecho, tiene 20 años, comenta que gracias a la ayuda de sus padres está pudiendo estudiar y luchar de esa forma por sus metas.
Ella es una estudiante que se esmera mucho, ya que quiere ser una profesional útil no solo para sí misma, sino también para los demás, quiere poder retribuir a su familia todo lo que han hecho por ella.
Pide este préstamo para poder pagar las cuotas de su carrera, y de esa forma poder seguir luchando.
texts.en:
Fatima is studying for a degree in Law. She is aged 20, and says that thanks to her parents' help she is able to study and fight in this way for her goals.

She is a student who works very hard, as she wants to be a useful working professional not just for herself, but also for others: she wants to be able to give back to her family everything they have done for her.

She is requesting this loan to pay her university fees, so that she can continue fighting.

loans.use: to pay her university fees.

loans.name: Mohamad

texts.en:
Mohamad is a 44-year-old Lebanese married man from Lebanon. He is living with his wife and four children. He is the main income provider in the family and works as an electrician. His wife owns clothes shop and helps him to provide their children with an abundant life.

Today, he is asking to borrow a loan from Kiva's partner Vitas s.a.l to pay school fees. He said that this loan will surely help him ensure the school year for them and this makes him very joyful.

loans.use: to pay the school fees.

loans.name: Alaa

texts.en: Alaa is a 33-year-old married man living with his wife and two young children, who are still attending school. He is the main source of income for the family. He has his business; he owns a wheels store in his town to fulfill his family needs. Due to the hard financial situation, Alaa is requesting a loan from Kiva partner Vitas s.a.l to pay his children’s school fees. His only purpose is to help them attain high educational levels to help them to achieve their dreams.

loans.use: to pay his children’s school fees.

loans.name: Vjollca

texts.en: Vjollca wants to thank all of the lenders for the previous loan she has used to renovate her bathroom. The loan has helped her to improve the living conditions of her family and create healthy and clean conditions. Her husband still works as a guard with a very low salary. Recently Vjollca has started to do handicraft work from her home in order to support her family. Now she is requesting a loan for the second time to purchase material needed for her work. She is optimistic that she will be able, through her new business, to offer her children a better education. She wants to thank all of the lenders.

loans.use: to purchase material needed for her handicraft work to increase her income to pay for her children's education.

loans.name: Vicente

texts.en:
Vicente works hard to support his family. Vicente is married and has a food vending business in the Philippines.

Vicente requested a PHP 18,000 loan through NWTF to buy ingredients, like cooking oil, sugar, bananas, etc., for his food production business.

Vicente has been in this business for 10 years now.

Vicente would like to save enough to provide a secure future for his family.

loans.use: to buy ingredients like cooking oil, sugar, bananas, etc. for his food production business.

loans.name: Maria

texts.es:
Maria proviene de una familia humilde y sacrificada, está estudiando la carrera de enfermería, a través de la cual quiere ayudar a las personas en su salud.
Está casada, y es su marido quien siempre la apoya en sus metas, y quien siempre está a su lado en todo lo que necesita.
Pide este préstamo para poder pagar las cuotas de su carrera, y de esa forma poder seguir con sus estudios. Agradece por la oportunidad que recibe de poder seguir estudiando.
texts.en:
Maria comes from a humble and self-sacrificing family. She is studying Nursing through which she wants to help people with their health.

She is married and her husband is the person who always helps her with her goals and is at her side for whatever she needs.

She is requesting this loan to be able to pay the fees for her studies and in this way she can continue with her studies. She is grateful for the opportunity she is receiving to be able to continue her studies.

loans.use: to pay the fees for her studies.

loans.name: Myriam Elena

texts.es: Elena tiene 39 años de edad, es de estado civil casada, tiene dos hijas, Miriam de seis, y Cristina de cinco años de edad, ellas estudian en una escuela de su localidad, Elena es una persona muy responsable y constante con su trabajo, pues trabaja muy duro para darle lo necesario a sus niñas, ya que su esposo se dedica al jornal y con lo que el gana no puede sustentar a su familia. Ella se dedica al comercio de papas, hace 8 años, solicita el crédito para la compra de mas sembrios y así obtener ganancias para seguir cumpliendo con las necesidades de su familia.
texts.en:
Elena is 39, and is married. She has two children: Miriam, aged 6 and Cristina who is 5 years old. They both study at the local school.

Elena is a very responsible person who is very diligent with her work. She works very hard to give her children what they need, as her spouse is a day laborer, and his wage alone is not enough to sustain the family.

For the last 8 years, she has earned her living selling potatoes. She is requesting a loan to buy more crops so that she can obtain the income necessary to continue to give her family what they need.

loans.use: to invest in potato sales.

loans.name: Rosa Elvira

texts.es: Elvira  tiene 62 años de edad, es de estado civil viuda, vive con su hija y con sus nietos,  ella se dedica a la crianza y venta de chanchos, esto le permite obtener ganancias para los gastos de su hogar, solicita de este crédito para la compra de más chanchos, así podrá vender más y sus ganancias aumentaran.
texts.en: Elvira is 62 years old and is a widow. She lives with her daughter and her grandchildren. She works raising and selling pigs and this allows her to obtain earnings for the household expenses. She is requesting this loan to buy more pigs so she can sell more and her profits will increase.

loans.use: to buy and sell pigs.

loans.name: Lira Venus

texts.en:
Armed with her dream of putting up her own restaurant someday, Lira is working really hard to improve her business. She knows that the income derived from her canteen varies from time to time. It is affected by the school schedule and presence of students to whom she usually caters. That is why she adds grocery items and the usual commodities needed by her neighbors every day. She also sells fruits and frozen goods to enhance her inventory. With these, she can continue earning on a regular basis.

Lira still longs to improve her business in order to support the growing expenses of her children in college. She needs to augment the salary of her husband Arnaldo, a cook. This is the reason why Lira is imploring you for some help in the amount of PHP 40,000. She is positive that you have the kind heart for small entrepreneurs like her. She wants to thank you in advance.

She is living in Bacolod City, Negros Occidental together with her family. She’s one of those hardworking people who were able to “build back better” their businesses after Typhoon Haiyan in 2013. She draws inspiration from her co-fellowship* members, who meet every week to share stories of their lives and businesses, and to draw strength from the Word of God.

*All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to buy more fruits, frozen goods, grocery items, and ingredients for her canteen business.

loans.name: Juan

texts.es:
Juan es de la ciudad de Coronel Oviedo, es estudiante de la carrera de ingeniería civil, es hijo de madre soltera, tiene un servicio de alquileres el cual le ayuda a poder cubrir sus gastos de la universidad.
Él es una persona muy trabajadora, que lucha por poder ser un buen profesional que sea útil a la demás personas de la sociedad.
Pide este préstamo para poder pagar las cuotas de la carrera, y también para la compra de materiales de estudios.
texts.en:
Juan is from the city of Coronel Oviedo. He is a student in the civil engineering program. He is the son of a single mother. He has a rental service that helps him to be able to cover his university expenses.

He is a very hard-working person who fights to be able to be a good professional who is useful to other people in society.

He is asking for this loan in order to be able to pay school fees, and also to buy study materials.

loans.use: to pay school fees and buy study materials

loans.name: Tea

texts.en:
Tea is 28 years old and married. She lives with her husband in the small village of Shrosha, Zestaponi district. Her husband works physically in order to generate daily income and cover everyday expenses. 

Tea is unemployed and requested a loan from the Start Up program, a joint venture with Kiva and Credo, for 1,700 GEL, which she will use to purchase a cow and start producing dairy products to sell and use for the family.

loans.use: to purchase a cow

loans.name: Francisco

texts.es:
Francisco continua estudiando arduamente, su carrera es la de medicina, sueña con poder ser un profesional útil, que ayude a las demás personas en algo tan importante como lo salud, comenta que gracias a su préstamo anterior pago las cuotas de su carrera, lo cual le fue de mucha ayuda, ya que su carrera es muy costosa.
Hoy pide este nuevo préstamo para poder pagar de vuelta las cuotas de su carrera, y seguir con sus estudios. Comenta que su meta próxima es seguir estudiando y llegar a ser especialista en Psiquiatría Forense, ejercerla y llevar una vida profesional muy exitosa.
texts.en:
Francisco is still working hard towards his degree in Medicine. He dreams of becoming a useful working professional who helps other people in something as important as health. He says that thanks to his previous loan he has paid his fees, which was very helpful as his degree is very expensive.

Now he is requesting this new loan to pay his university fees once again, so that he can continue studying. He says that his next goal is to continue studying, and to become a specialist in forensic psychiatry, practice it, and live a successful professional life.

loans.use: to pay his university fees.

loans.name: Laura

texts.es: Laura  tiene 53 años de edad, es de estado civil soltera, vive con su madre que es de muy avanzada edad,  ella se dedica a la crianza y venta de chanchos, esto le permite obtener ganancias para los gastos de su hogar, solicita de este crédito para la compra de más chanchos, así podrá vender más y sus ganancias aumentaran.
texts.en: Laura is 53 years old.  She is single and lives with her mother, who is very old.  She raises and sells pigs for a living, which allows her to earn income for her home expenses.  She is requesting this loan to purchase more pigs, so she will be able to sell more, increasing her earnings.

loans.use: to buy and sell pigs.

loans.name: Leah

texts.en:
Leah's general store is earning more income, which helps her to quickly repay her first loan. She used her first loan to increase her stocks and attracted more customers to buy from her, which makes her business grow.

Leah requested her second loan, which she will use to buy food items such as bales of rice, cartons of biscuits, and cartons of canned food for her general store. She pays her children's school fees and continues to provide for her family's daily needs.

loans.use: to purchase bales of rice, cartons of biscuits, and cartons of canned food.

loans.name: Charline

texts.fr:
Charline est une femme âgée de 47 ans. Elle est mariée et vivent ensemble avec leurs 3 enfants dans un quartier de la ville. Elle tient une poissonnerie à son domicile depuis 6 mois et vend des bananes depuis très longtemps.
Elle a déjà pris des prêts auparavant chez Vahatra pour la vente de bananes dont les bénéfices lui ont permis de démarrer une autre activité complémentaire de poissonnerie. Elle a pu acheter 2 congélateurs. Pour ce prêt, elle va acheter des poissons à vendre dans son poissonnerie. Elle espère vendre beaucoup de poissons car elle est la seule poissonnerie du coin.
Elle travaille dure dans la vie pour donner un meilleur avenir à ses enfants. Elle a comme objectif de constituer beaucoup d’épargnes pour assurer l’avenir.
texts.en:
Charline is a 47-year-old woman, married, and living together with their three children in a district in town. She has had a seafood shop in her home for six months. And she has been selling bananas for a very long time.

She has already take out loans before at Vahatra for selling bananas. The profits from it have enabled her to start another complementary business involving seafood. She was able to purchase 2 freezers. For this loan, she is going to purchase some fish to sell in her shop. She hopes to sell a lot of fish, since she is the only seafood shop in the neighborhood.

She works hard in life to give her children the best future. Her goal is to build up a lot of savings, for the future.

loans.use: to purchase fish to sell in her seafood shop

loans.name: Amna

texts.en: Amna is an amazing mother who lives in small village near Hebron. She has two children and she is working hard to ensure a good life for them and ensure that they do not need anything.Amna's husband works as employee , but he can not cover all the needs for his big family. She wants to help him in any way she can and because she is a very productive and ambitious woman, she decided to open her own business.Amna started her business five years ago. She sews clothes to sell. After she felt that she had a good experience in this business, she decided to expand and develop her work. Therefore she applied for a loan to help her buy a new sewing machine and yarns and fabrics to increase her income.She needs your support to achieve her dreams.

loans.use: to buy a new sewing machine and yarns and fabrics to increase her income.

loans.name: Confiemos En Dios Group

texts.es: Confiemos en Dios es un grupo conformado por tres mujeres trabajadoras y emprendedoras, coordinado por Doña María Inés de 68 años de edad, casada, ella es una mujer laboriosa que se dedica a la venta de tortilla y frijoles cocidos desde hace ocho años, en el negocio le ayuda su hija en la elaboración de las tortillas. El crédito lo solicita por cuarta vez en la institución, para la compra de maíz, leña y frijoles. Con el crédito anterior logro comprar láminas de zinc para mejorar el techo de su casa, la segunda socia es Lidia de 43 años de edad, quien se dedica a la venta de prendas, la tercer socia es María Guadalupe de 40 años de edad quien se dedica a la venta de ropa.
texts.en:
"Confiemos en Dios" is a group made up of three hard-working and enterprising women, coordinated by María Inés. She is 68 years old and married. She is a hard-working woman who has worked selling tortillas and cooked beans for eight years. Her daughter helps her in the business with the preparation of the tortillas. She is requesting her fourth loan from the Institution to buy corn, wood and beans. With her previous loan she bought zinc sheeting to improve the roof of her house.

The second member is Lidia who is 42 years old and works selling clothing. The third member is María Guadalupe is 40 years old and also sells clothing.

loans.use: to buy corn, wood and beans.

loans.name: Erlinda

texts.en:
