This is why she requested a loan, a Kiva loan, an opportunity to link up to the world of finance through Fundación Mario Santo Domingo in order to buy chairs and tables, food for her meals, bottles of yogurt, and clothing for the Christmas season. Liliana is an enterprising woman who with this financing will succeed in benefiting her family and growing in her business.

loans.use: to buy chairs and tables, food for her meals, bottles of yogurt and clothing for the Christmas season

loans.name: Luis Anibal

texts.es: Aníbal  es de estado civil soltero, tiene 35 años de edad, el se dedica a la producción y venta de leche, el ya lleva en esta dura actividad más de 10 años, el solicita del crédito para comprar una vaca de leche para aumentar la producción, y así mejorar su calidad de vida y satisfacer sus necesidades diarias.
texts.en: Aníbal is single. He is 35 years old. His work is milk production and sales. He has already been doing this hard work for more than 10 years. He is asking for the loan in order to buy a milk cow to increase production, and in this way improve his quality of life and satisfy his daily needs.

loans.use: to buy a milk cow

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: el joven a quien se le ha pixeleado la cara por tener 24 años de edad y vivir en zona de alto riesgo, se dedica a la venta de pan con cafe de manera ambulante por los diferentes mercados tiene varios años de dedicarse a esa actividad y gracias a sus ventas es como logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, el jovne vive en casa propia con su grupo familiar, el esta solicitando un credito para la compra de pan, cafe y azucar por mayor para poder continuar con sus ventas y asi tener mejores ingresos economicos.
texts.en: The young man, whose face has been pixellated since he is 24 years old and lives in a high-risk area, sells bread with coffee by traveling to the various markets. He has been doing this work for several years and it is thanks to his sales that he is able to cover some of his household expenses. He lives in his own house with his family. He is asking for a loan in order to buy bread, coffee, and sugar wholesale in order to be able to continue with his sales and thus have a better income.

loans.use: to buy bread, coffee, and sugar wholesale

loans.name: Salome

texts.en:
Salome raises hogs to earn a living. She raises and sells pigs to the local settlers in her place. She is a forty-five year old married woman and has eleven children. Seven of them are still attending school. Her income mainly goes for food and school expenses.

Aside from hog raising, she also engages in a direct selling business. She sells Avon products like lotion, body spray, whitening soap, and apparel.

Salome has requested a loan to purchase feed and purchase more supplies of Avon products. These could help enhance her source of income and slowly enable her to settle her obligation.

She is thankful for the funds and is determined to manage them successfully to support the education of her children and to improve the family's living condition, too.

loans.use: to purchase feed and purchase more supplies of Avon products.

loans.name: María Del Rosario

texts.es:
María es una señora que vive en una comunidad de la ciudad, ella vive con sus padres los cuales están avanzados de edad y están bajo su cuido, ella estudió hasta el octavo grado ya que le tocó trabajar debido a la pobreza que vivían, ella está soltera, estuvo casada pero su matrimonio fracasó.
 
María a lo largo de la vida a trabajado de una y otra cosa para poder salir adelante, actualmente posee un molino en cual trabaja dándole una servicio de buena calidad a sus clientes, trabaja todos los días de 6 am hasta la 4 pm ella aparte de eso en ocasiones sale a vender ropa más que todo cuando está cerca la temporada navideña que es cuando más se vende.
  
María necesita un préstamo para reparar su molino donde muele maíz, ya que tiene un desperfecto mecánico y al repararlo podrá seguir trabajando y generando ingresos los cuales son el sustento de su familia.

El sueño principal de María es tener un hijo y que Dios le siga dando salud.
texts.en:
María is a woman who lives in a community in the city. She lives with her parents who are advanced in age and are under her care. She studied up to the eighth grade because she had to work due to the poverty they lived in. She is single; she was married but her marriage failed.

María, throughout life, has worked here and there to be able to get ahead. She currently owns a mill in which she works giving a good quality service to her customers. She works daily from 6AM to 4PM. Apart from that, sometimes she goes out to sell clothes, mostly when the holiday season is near, which is when there's greater sales.

María needs a loan to repair her mill where she grinds corn as it has a mechanical defect. Upon repairing it, she will be able to continue working and generating income which are the livelihood of her family. Her main dream is having a child and for God to continue giving her health.

loans.use: to repair her mill where she grinds corn as it has a mechanical defect.

loans.name: Edna

texts.en:
Edna is 63-years-old and married with eleven children. She works very hard to provide for them.

Edna has a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 5,000 loan through NWTF to buy more groceries to sell.

She has been in this business for eight years and sells a variety of items such as canned goods, spices, noodles and other groceries.

In the future, Edna would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more groceries to sell.

loans.name: Rovenita

texts.en:
Rovenita is 50-years-old and married with two children, one of whom is in school. She is a very hard working entrepreneur.

Rovenita has a soft drinks retailing business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 10,000 loan amount through NWTF in order to buy additional stock of soft drinks to sell.

Rovenita has been in this business for ten years. In the future, Rovenita would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy additional stock of soft drinks to sell.

loans.name: Ana Elvira

texts.es: Ana es una microempresaria de 55 años que laboró en una empresa privada durante años y una compañera le sugirió incorporarse en las ventas por catálogos, ella aceptó la propuesta y empezó a generar ventas de productos de belleza.  Por circunstancias de la vida Ana tomó la determinación de dejar su empleo y dedicarse de lleno a la actividad comercial que había estado ejerciendo pero amplió su oferta de productos, ella empezó a vender calzado y ropa exterior con muy buenos resultados. En la actualidad cuenta con 8 años en el oficio y aprovecha las temporadas del año para vender artículos alegóricos a cada temporada, es por ello que realizó una solicitud de crédito, un credikiva, oportunidad para vincularse a la vida financiera a través de la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo para comprar artículos navideños; dulces, figuras, adornos y surtir con nuevas colecciones de ropa y calzado.  Ana está casada y es madre de dos hijos de 29 y 18 años y su meta es apoyar a su hijo menor en los gastos de sus estudios profesionales y terminar de construir su vivienda.
texts.en:
Ana is a micro-entrepreneur of 55 who worked in a private business for years. A colleague suggested that she sign up for sales by catalog. She accepted the proposal and began to generate sales of beauty products. Because of life circumstances, Ana resolved to leave her job and work completely in the commercial business that she had been working in, but she expanded her offerings of products. She began to sell footwear and outerwear with very good results.

Now she has 8 years in this work, and she takes advantage of the seasons of the year to sell allegorical articles for each season. It is for this reason that she made an application for a loan, a Kiva loan, an opportunity to become connected to a financial life through the Mario Santo Domingo Foundation, to buy Christmas articles (sweets, figures, decorations) and to stock up with new collections of clothing and footwear.

Ana is married and is the mother of two children, ages 29 and 18. Her goals are to support her younger son in the expenses for his professional studies and to finish building her house.

loans.use: to buy Christmas items (sweets, figures, decorations) and to stock up on new collections of clothing and footwear.

loans.name: Mary Jane

texts.en:
Mary Jane is 35-years-old and married with three children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur.

Mary Jane has a fish vending business in the Philippines. Mary Jane requested a PHP 8,000 loan amount through NWTF in order to buy fishing gear and other equipment.

Mary Jane has been in this business for twelve years. In the future, Mary Jane would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy fishing gear and other equipment.

loans.name: Jorge Alberto

texts.es:
Jorge es un señor de 51 años de edad, el cual toda su vida se ha dedicado a trabajar desde muy pequeño, él está casado y tiene tres hijos los cuales viven junto con él y su esposa trabaja como ama de casa.
 

Jorge posee un molino de maíz, también ha realizado esta actividad toda su vida, este labor la ha practicado desde que era tan solo un niño, aparte de eso Jorge sale a pescar al mar con anzuelo y es así como él se mantiene activo generando ingresos para el hogar.
  
Él solicita este crédito para comprar otro molino y ponerlo en el centro de la ciudad ya que considera que con dos molinos los ingresos serán al doble pues podrá satisfacer la demanda de más clientes.

El gran sueño de Jorge es tener toda una cadena de molinos en toda la ciudad, pero comenta que hay que trabajar muy duro para poder lograrlo, así mismo sueña con ver culminar los estudios de sus hijos.
texts.en:
Jorge is a 51-year-old man. All his life he has worked, from the time he was very young. He is married and has three children, who live with him, and his wife works as a housewife.

Jorge has a corn mill. He has also done this work his whole life; he has done it since he was only a child. Apart from that Jorge goes out to fish in the sea with a lure and this is how he keeps active generating income for the household.

He is asking for this loan in order to buy another mill and put it in the center of the city, since he thinks that with two mills the income will be doubled because he will be able to satisfy the demand of more customers.

Jorge's great dream is to have a chain of mills around the city, but he says that very hard work is required in order to be able to achieve it. He also dreams of seeing his children complete their studies.

loans.use: to buy another mill and put it in the center of the city

loans.name: Juana Francisca

texts.es:
Juana tiene 43 años de edad, no pudo estudiar porque su familia tenía dificultades económicas, tiene 4 hijos y es madre soltera, por lo tanto solo sus hijos dependen de ella.


Juana posee un negocio de mariscos, además  trabaja como empleada de oficios domésticos, cada día se levanta muy temprano para ejercer sus labores cotidianas pues se siente motivada ya que así es como obtiene ingresos para sacar adelante a sus hijos.


Hoy en día Juana quiere emprender un nuevo negocio, quiere dedicarse a la compra y venta de ropa, es por eso que necesita este crédito para comprar blusas, camisas y pantalones y ponerlos en venta.

   
Ella sueña con obtener mayores ganancias de su negocio, mejorar su vivienda y poder darle la mejor educación que se merecen sus hijos.
texts.en:
Juana is 43 years old. She was not able to study because her family had economic difficulties. She has 4 children and is a single mother, so only her children depend on her.

Juana has a shellfish business. She also works as a domestic employee. Every day she gets up very early to carry out her daily work. She feels motivated since it is in this way that she obtains income to move her children forward.

Today Juana wants to start a new business. She wants to buy and sell clothing. This is why she needs this loan to buy blouses, shirts, and pants and put them on sale.

She dreams of obtaining larger profits from her business, improving her house, and being able to give her children the best education, which they deserve.

loans.use: to buy blouses, shirts, and pants and put them on sale

loans.name: Gloria

texts.en:
Gloria hails from the town of Pilar. She operates a sari-sari (variety) store. She sells commodities like noodles, milk, sugar, seasonings, soap, shampoo and assorted canned goods. She has five grown children.

Her sari-sari (variety) store is situated near her home and serves customers, mostly neighbors in her place. She would like to stock up her shop, but she has very limited capital to fill those goods that are out of stock.

Gloria would like to improve her yield to improve the family’s living condition. Therefore, she decided to join CEVI to access a loan. She wants to buy assorted stock like beverages, soft drinks and assorted canned goods.

In that way, she would be able to cater to the needs of her clients and continue to expand her livelihood.

loans.use: to buy assorted stock like beverages, soft drinks and assorted canned goods.

loans.name: Judith

texts.en:
Judith is 69-years-old and married with five children. She works very hard to provide for them.

Judith has a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 8,000 loan through NWTF in order to buy additional stock of groceries to sell.

She has been in this business for 2 years and sells a variety of items such as rice, sugar, soap and other groceries.

In the future Judith would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy additional stock of groceries to sell.

loans.name: Maria Del Carmen

texts.es: María tiene 38 años de edad, es de estado civil soltero, ella se dedica al comercio de chanchos, ella es un apersona tranquila y muy responsable con su trabajo, ya que a esta actividad q se dedica más de 10 años, esta actividad se ha vuelto una gran fuente de trabajo, gracias a este negocio ella ha podido salir adelante  con los gastos de su hogar, solicita el crédito para poder invertir en mas chanchos, para poder aumentar sus ganancias.
texts.en:
Maria is 38 years old, is single, and makes a living in the pig business. She is calm person and very responsible with her work. 

Being that she has worked in this occupation for more than 10 years, this job has become a great source of work. Thanks to this business, she has been able to get ahead with her household expenses. She is requesting a loan in order to invest in more pigs so that she can increase her earnings.

loans.use: to buy and sell pigs.

loans.name: La-Arni

texts.en:
La-Arni is 48-years-old and married with two children. She works hard to provide for her family. She has a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF in order to buy additional stock of groceries to sell.

La-Arni has borrowed and paid 4 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for eight years and also earns an income from a restaurant.

La-Arni aspires to save enough money to expand her business and repair her family's home.

loans.use: to buy additional stock of groceries to sell.

loans.name: Rene Alberto

texts.es: Rene de 31 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa y sus dos hijos, el se dedica al cultivo de granos basicos desde hace 10 años, y con las ventas que realiza logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, el quiere mejora su vivienda encemnetando el piso y cambiando el techo pero como no posee de suficiente capital esta solicitando un credito para la compra de los materiales de construccion necesarios para poder tener una vivienda mas comoda y segura.
texts.en:
Rene, who is 31 years old, lives in his own house with his wife and their two children. He has worked raising basic grains for 10 years. With the sales that he makes, he manages to pay some household expenses.

He wants to improve his home by cementing the floor and replacing the roof, but as he doesn't have sufficient capital, he is applying for a loan for the purchase of the necessary construction materials to be able to have a more comfortable and safe home.

loans.use: to buy the necessary construction materials.

loans.name: Wilma

texts.en:
For the last 4 years, Wilma has run a sari-sari (variety) store, selling various commodities ranging from bread, biscuits, beverages, seasonings, noodles, canned goods and toiletries. She is a 46-year-old married woman with five children residing in the town of Carmen. Her oldest child is 17 and the youngest is 2.

She owns a house and in front of it is situated a sari-sari (variety) store that caters mostly to locals in her place. She would like to improve her earnings and acquire additional capital to purchase inventory for her store. Thus, her earnings will go high. In that way, she would be able to support the needs of her family and manage her finances wisely.

Wilma has requested a loan to purchase assorted groceries and soft drinks.

loans.use: to purchase assorted groceries and soft drinks.

loans.name: Tessie

texts.en:
Tessie is a 38 years old resident of Batasan, Philippines and a member of Center of Community Transformation (CCT).

As one of her sources of income, Tessie runs a buy and sell ready-to-wear clothes business. She earns about Php 10,000 each month.

Tessie applied for a Php 10, 000 loan and is praying that CCT will approve the amount. If granted, she’ll pay to build for a wagon since she operates along sidewalks. This will significantly result in an increase on the business’ daily sales.

And since there’s always a price change on every product, a revolving fund is what she aims to have to maintain her business.

Tessie also dreams of expanding her business where she can sell clothing and products such as bed sheets and footwear.

Tessie is consistent in attending weekly fellowship group for CCT partners that consists of 15 to 30 members where she gain spiritual strength for member’s life changing testimony, share her own experience of God’s love, pay Micro Finance loans and hear God’s word that was conveyed to them every week.

loans.use: to build a wagon to help her sell items.

loans.name: Violenda

texts.en:
Violenda is able to manage her business with the help of the Center for Community Transformation (CCT) and lenders who joined the Kiva program.

Php 15,000 is what she needs; that’s why this amount was applied for as a loan from CCT.

She’s grateful that there are people willing to share God’s blessings without expecting anything in return. Because of God’s guidance and people with compassionate hearts, she’s able to earn about Php 24,000 every month.

Violenda expresses sincere appreciation as she is able to purchase grocery products for her business.

Violenda started with a very small amount of capital. But she’s able to pay for household expenses and provide support for her family. She aims for her business to progress yearly, to provide more products at her variety store.

Violenda has been consistent in attending CCT fellowship group that consist of 15 to 30 members where she hears the word of God and testimonies from partners, this made her to become strong spiritually and dependent to God on every occasion.

loans.use: to buy grocery items to sell.

loans.name: Merlinda

texts.en:
Merlinda works hard to support her family. She is married and has a pig fattening business in the Philippines.

Merlinda requested a PHP 16,000 loan through NWTF to purchase feeds, vitamins and other supplies for her business.

Merlinda has been in this business for 10 years now. She would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase feeds, vitamins and other supplies for her business.

loans.name: Wendinsongde De Goue Group

texts.fr:
Mme PAULINE  est la représentante du groupe WENDINSONGDE DE GOUE. Elle est Mariée, mère  de 04 enfants. Elle a un enfant de 27 ans et un enfant de 20 ans. Elle a 03 enfants qui vont  à l’école et  07 personnes en charges.
Mme fait de l'agriculture. Elle pratique l'activité depuis  29 ans. Elle s’approvisionne dans le marché de son village. Ses clients sont les femmes, les hommes de son village et de la ville de ouagadougou.
Avec l’argent octroyé, elle compte acheter 01 sac d’engrais et 02 cartons d’insecticide pour avoir de bonnes cultures.
Elle va utiliser les bénéfices du prêt pour acheter des habits pour ses enfants. Les ambitions sont: pour l'affaire elle veut  agrandir la superficie de son champs, pour la famille, elle veut payer la scolarité de ses enfants.
texts.en:
Ms. PAULINE is the representative of the group WENDINSONGDE DE GOUE. She is the married mother of four children. She has a 27-year-old and a 20-year-old. She has three children who attend school and seven persons to support.

Ms. PAULINE is a farmer. She has doing this work for 29 years. Her supplies are gotten from the market in her village. Her customers are the women and men from her village and from the city of Ouagadougou.

With the money granted, she intends to purchase a sac of fertilizer and two boxed of insecticide to grow good crops.

She is going to use the profits from the loan to purchase clothing for her children. Her ambitions include: expanding her farm fields for business purposes and covering her children’s schooling costs.

loans.use: to purchase a sack of fertilizer and 2 boxes of insecticide to grow good crops.

loans.name: Alba Alicia

texts.es: Alicia en una mujer de 37 años de edad, es de estado civil viuda, tiene tres hijos, Mary de 12 años, Fernando  de 9 años y Luis de 5 años de edad, ella es una persona muy dedicada y tranquila con su trabajo, ya se dedica a esta actividad más de 5 años, ella solicita el crédito para poder incrementar su negocio ya que se ha convertido en una gran fuente de ingresos ya q por medio de esto ella puede sacar adelante a sus hijos, y bellos pueden tener una buena educación.
texts.en:
Alicia is a woman of 37 years of age. Her civil status is widowed. She has three children, Mary, age 12; Fernando, age 9; and Luis, age 5. She is a very dedicated person who is serene in her work, since she has worked in this business for more than 5 years.

She is applying for the loan to be able to boost her business, since it has become a great source of income, since through it she can raise her children and they can have a good education.

loans.use: to boost her sweater and jacket business.

loans.name: Tabgninga Group

texts.fr: Sadongo,est la responsable du groupe elle est mariée et mère de 05 enfants. le groupe de Sadongo est à son 3 ème contrat de prêt à ACFIME et les remboursement se font à bonne date. Cette brave dame vend des condiments et du céréale et cela fait 16 ans qu'elle fait ce commerce. Elle a besoin du crédit pour acheter de l'arachide à 60 000 francs, acheter du haricot à 50 000 francs, du mil à 60 000 francs, de l'huile à 15 000 f, de la patte de tomate à 12 500 f et le 27 500 comme fonds de roulement. Pour avancé son activité Sadongo est accueillante et respectueuse envers ses clients, par moment elle fait des remises. Après ses ventes, les bénéfices de Sandogo lui permettra de contribuer son activité et aussi de faire les dépenses de sa familles.
texts.en:
Sadongo is the official of the group and the married mother of five children. Her group is on its 3rd loan contract at ACFIME, and it makes the payment on time. For sixteen years, this good and honest woman has been selling condiments and grains as her business. She has need of a loan to purchase some peanuts worth 60,000 francs; beans worth 50,000 francs; millet worth 60,000 francs; oil worth 15,000 francs; and tomato paste worth 12,500 francs. The 27,500 francs would be for working capital.

To advance her business, Sadongo is accommodating and respectful to her customers. Sometimes she offers discounts. After making sales, her profits will enable her to help her business and also to cover family expenses.

loans.use: to purchase peanuts, beans, millet, oil, and tomato paste

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: el joven a quien se le ha pixeleado la cara por tener 29 años de edad y vivir en zona de alto riesgo, se dedica a aferrar madera la cual despues vende a los carpinteros, tiene 8 años de dedicarse a esa actividad la cual es su unica fuente de ingresos, el joven vive en casa propia con su esposa y sus tres hijos, el quiere mejorar su vivienda introduciendo energia electrica ya que no cuanta con luz propia, pero con lo que obtiene de su trabajo no le alcanza por esa razon esta solicitando un credito para el pago para la instalacion de energia y asi el y su familia puedan tener una viviend digna.
texts.en: The young man whose face is blurred because he is 29 years old and lives in a high-risk area makes a living by chopping wood that he then sells to carpenters. He has had this business for eight years and it is his only source of income. He lives in a house with his wife and their three children. He wants to improve their home, introducing electricity, as they still do not have lighting of their own, but what he earns from his work isn't enough to do so.  For this reason he is asking for a loan to pay for the installation of electricity so he and his family can have a dignified home.

loans.use: to install electricity

loans.name: San Isidro De Yungaqui Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenece al banco comunal “San Isidro de Yungaqui” perteneciente a la comunidad de Yungaqui en el distrito de Anta, perteneciente a la provincia de Anta del departamento del Cusco.

La socia Benigna se dedica a la venta de maíz, queso y leche. Estas actividades le permiten salir adelante a ella y a sus tres hijos. La socia tiene 52 años de edad y unas ganas de trabajar y seguir expandiendo su negocio, por eso ella trabaja desde las 6 de la mañana hasta las 5 de la tarde, movilizándose en busca de clientes.
La socia solicito el crédito para comprar maíz por mayor, que luego venderá por kilos.

Los otros socios se dedican al negocio de venta de comida, negocio de agricultura, negocio de tienda de abarrotes y negocio de venta de animales.

Los socios están contentos con el crédito otorgado por los inversionista de KIVA y se compromete a pagar puntualmente sus cuotas.
texts.en:
These members belong to the communal bank "San Isidro de Yungaqui," which is in the community of Yungaqui in the district and province of Anta and the department of Cusco.

Bank member Benigna sells corn, cheese, and milk. These activities allow her and her three children to get ahead. She is 52 years old and has the will to work and continue expanding her business. For this reason, she works from 6 in the morning until 5 in the afternoon, actively seeking customers.

She is applying for the loan to purchase corn wholesale, which she will then sell by the kilo.

The other members work in businesses of selling food, agriculture, grocery store, and selling animals.

The members are happy about the loan granted by the Kiva investors and promise to make their payments punctually.

loans.use: to buy corn.

loans.name: Ntabunebwe Group

texts.fr:
Lucie fait partie du groupe  Ntabunebwe et  habite à  Bujumbura. Elle a 43 ans et est marie Pascal un cultivateur. Ensemble ils ont 6 enfants  âgés de 1 à 19  ans dont 4 étudient.

Elle a un enfant membre de sa famille élargie à sa charge.
 
Elle fait le commerce de bananes et de pommes de terre  depuis  5 ans. 

Elle est à son quatrième   crédit  à Turame. Avec le crédit KIVA qu’elle obtient, elle va  augmenter son capital et acheter  une grande quantité de bananes et de pommes de terre à revendre pour gagner plus. 

Dans les prochaines  années, elle  voudrait  ouvrir une boutique et voir ses enfants étudier.
texts.en:
Lucie is part of the group Ntabunebwe and lives in Bujumbura. She is 43 years old and married to Pascal, a farmer. Together they have six children, from 1 to 19 years old, of whom four are students.

She has a child, a member of her extended family, to support.

Lucie has been doing commerce in bananas and potatoes for five years.

She is on her 4th loan at Turame. With the KIVA loan she is obtaining, she is going to increase her capital and purchase a large amount of bananas and potatoes to resell, so as to earn more.

In the coming years, she would like to open a store and see her children educated.

loans.use: to purchase a large amount of bananas and potatoes to resell, so as to earn more

loans.name: Tuamuke Group

texts.fr: Roda est commerçante, membre de la banque communautaire «Tuamuke», cliente de l’IMF Hekima, mariée, âgée de 41 ans mère 8 enfants tous scolarisés. Elle est vendeuse de la tomate dans un  marché de la ville depuis 6 ans. Elle va s’approvisionner en six paniers de tomates. Elle débuta par le premier fonds reçu de son mari. Elle souhaite augmenter son activité et scolariser ses enfants. Au final, elle remercie Hekima pour le soutien apporté aux entrepreneurs non bancables.
texts.en:
Roda is a merchant and a member of the community bank called “Tuamuke”. A client of the microfinance institution Hekima, she is married, 41 years old, and the mother of eight children, all in school. She has been a vendor of tomatoes at a market in town for six years. She is going to stock up with six baskets of tomatoes.

Roda began with initial funds from her husband. Her wish is to increase her business and provide an education to her children. So she thanks Hekima for supporting unbanked entrepreneurs.

loans.use: to stock up with six baskets of tomatoes

loans.name: Honorata

texts.en:
Honorata is 56 years old and is married with 6 children. She is in the agriculture business, raising livestock in the Philippines.

Honorata has requested a 15,000 PHP loan through Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation to buy feed and other supplies to raise her livestock.

Honorata has been raising livestock for 27 years now, and she has borrowed 7 times in the past from NWTF in order to sustain it. She would like to save enough to be able to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy feed and other supplies to raise her livestock.

loans.name: Famille Mashauri Group

texts.fr: Actifs dans la riziculture depuis 21 ans, Bienfait et son épouse admettent que cette activité leur permet d'améliorer leur vie de mènage. Ils espèrent que leur problème d'insuffisance de fonds sera resolu petit à petit grâce au bon boulot qu'ils auront à faire et à l'appui de PAIDEK.
texts.en: Both active in rice farming for 21 years, Bienfait and his wife explain that this work enables them to improve their home life. They hope that their problem, a shortage of funds, will be resolved bit by bit through the right work they will have to do and through PAIDEK support.

loans.use: to pay for raking, plant care products, security, packaging, and manual labor

loans.name: Franklin Anibal

texts.es: Franklin  tiene 26 años de edad, es de estado civil soltero, el es una persona muy responsable y  constante con su trabajo, pues trabaja en la venta de botas para el trabajo en el campo. El se dedica hace tres años atrás a este negocio, Franklin solicita el crédito para la compra de más mercadería y así obtener ganancias para seguir cumpliendo con las necesidades de él y de su pequeño hogar.
texts.en:
Franklin is 26 years old. His civil status is single. He is a person who is very responsible and persevering in his work, He works selling boots for farm work. He has been working in this business for three years.

Franklin is applying for the loan to purchase more merchandise and thus obtain earnings to continue meeting his needs and those of his little household.

loans.use: to boost his business.

loans.name: Lolita

texts.en:
Lolita works hard to support her family. She is married and has a vegetable and spice vending business in the Philippines.

Lolita requested a PHP 20,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more vegetables and spices to sell.

Lolita has been in this business for three years now.

In the future, Lolita would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more vegetables and spices to sell

loans.name: Fidel Ángel

texts.es:
Fidel de 40 años de edad, estudió hasta noveno grado, dejó de estudiar por dedicarse a trabajar y ayudar a su madre y aportar económicamente después de que su padre falleció, luego se acompañó con quien actualmente es su esposa con la cual han procreado dos hijos que están estudiando, su hija este año se gradúa de noveno grado y su hijo estudia sexto grado, su esposa se dedica a los oficios domésticos y a la venta de pan y de lácteos.
 
Fidel es una persona muy trabajadora, se dedica y la venta de medicinas, vitaminas y plásticos en su comunidad y en las comunidades vecinas desde hace 10 años, además él impulsa programas de apoyo a las comunidades en conjunto con muchas instituciones, eso lo ha llevado a ser un buen líder, de modo que trabaja duro para que en su hogar no les falte nada.

La inversión de este crédito será destinada para comprar más medicinas y vitaminas para seguir vendiendo y así tener los ingresos necesarios para responder al pago del crédito y tener más ingresos para llevar el sustento diario a su.

Fidel sueña con seguir trabajando en el negocio de medicinas  para mejorar sus ingresos y que sus hijos sigan estudiando.
texts.en:
Fidel is 40 years old and learned up to the ninth grade. He quit his studies to go to work, help his mother, and contribute economically after his father died. Later, he entered into a long-term relationship with his now wife with whom he has had two children who are in school. This year, his daughter graduated from ninth grade. His son is in the sixth grade. His wife is a homemaker and sells bread and dairy products.

Fidel is a very hard-working person who has been making a living selling medicine, vitamins, and plastic containers in his and neighboring communities for the last 10 years. Additionally, he promotes support programs for communities in conjunction with many institutions. This has led him to be a good leader, and to work hard so that in his home, they lack nothing.

The investment of this loan is intended for the purchase of more medicine and vitamins in order to continue selling and therefore, to have the necessary income to take responsibility for the payment of the loan and have more income to provide for his daily sustenance.

Fidel's dreams of continuing to work in the medicine business in order to improve his income and so that his children will continue studying.

loans.use: to buy more medicine and vitamins in order to continue selling.

loans.name: Señor De Huanca De San Jeronimo Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “SEÑOR DE HUANCA DE SAN JERONIMO”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de San Jerónimo, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia Luisa es una mujer emprendedora ella se dedica a la crianza y venta de animales menores y a la  ganadería. La socia tiene 51 años y casi toda su vida la dedica  a estas dos actividades, gracias a su experiencia y  el cuidado que tiene con sus animales ella está  logrando salir adelante junto con su familia. 
La socia solicito el crédito para comprar gallinas y maíz.

Los socios que están pegados a la foto grupal se les tomo la foto después de la reunión porque pidieron permiso por motivos de trabajo.

Los otros socios se dedican al negocio de venta de artesanía, negocio de venta de animales, negocio de tienda de abarrotes y negocio de venta de verduras.
Los socios están contentos con el crédito otorgado, y agradecen a los inversionistas de KIVA por seguir confiando en ellos.
texts.en:
The partners belong to the communal bank "SEÑOR DE HUANCA DE SAN JERONIMO". This bank is located in the district of San Jerónimo, belonging to the province of Cusco and the department of Cusco.

The partner Luisa is an enterprising woman. She makes a living raising and selling small animals and in ranching. She is 51 years old and almost her whole life she has devoted to these two activities. Thanks to her experience and the care she takes with her animals, she is able to get ahead with her family.

The partner is requesting the loan in order to buy hens and corn.

The pictures of the partners who are inserted in the group photo were taken after the meeting because they requested permission for work reasons.

The other partners make a living in a handicrafts sales business, an animal sales business, a grocery shop business, and a vegetable sales business.

The partners are happy with the loan offered, and they thank the Kiva investors for continuing to have confidence in them.

loans.use: to buy hens and corn.

loans.name: Conchita

texts.en:
Conchita is 69 years old and widowed with 10 children.

Conchita is in the agricultural business, farming bananas in the Philippines. She has requested a 10,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies. Conchita has been farming bananas for the past 10 years and she has borrowed 19 previous loans from NWTF to sustain her business.

Conchita would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies.

loans.name: Miriam Del Carmen

texts.es:
Miriam de 25 años de edad, es una persona muy trabajadora y responsable, desde muy pequeña se ha dedicado al negocio de venta de frutas y ropa lo cual manifiesta que este medio de trabajo lo aprendió de su madre ya que ella le inculcó el trabajo, está acompañada y tiene una hija de tres años de edad.

 Miriam desde sus hace muchos años años se ha dedicado al comercio de frutas y  ropa, trabajo que realiza todos los días, teniendo en cuenta que por este medio donde obtiene sus ingresos y le permite salir adelante, ya que le es difícil conseguir otro empleo por no tener muchos estudios.


Ella solicita este crédito para comprar mas frutas y ropa para damas y caballeros pues quiere aprovechar la temporada que se aproxima.

Su sueño es expandir aún mas su negocio pues quiere tener un mayor margen de ganancias, sabe que debe trabajar duro ya que tiene una pequeña hija a quien sueña con darle lo mejor.
texts.en: Miriam is 25 years old. She is a very hardworking and responsible person. Since very young, she has worked in the business of selling fruits and clothes. She says that she learned this way of life through her mother, who taught her this work. She has a domestic partner and a three year old daughter. For many years, she has worked selling fruits and clothes, a job she does every day since it is how she earns her money, because it is difficult for her to find employment since she does not have much education. She is requesting this loan to buy more fruits and women and men clothes, because she wants to take advantage of the approaching season. Her dream is to expand her business more, because she wants to have a greater margin of earnings. She knows that she must work hard because she already has a small daughter, and she dreams of giving her all the best.

loans.use: to buy more fruits and women and men clothes.

loans.name: Rusovu Group

texts.fr:
J.M. Vianney  fait partie du groupe  Rusovu et  habite à  Rumonge. C’est un célibataire de 35 ans.

 Il fait  de poissons (ndagala) depuis  20 ans. 

Il est à son cinquième   crédit  à Turame. Avec le crédit KIVA qu’il obtient, il va  augmenter son capital et acheter  une grande quantité de poissons (ndagala)  à revendre pour gagner plus. 

Dans les prochaines  années, il  voudrait  faire l’élevage de vaches et se marier.
texts.en:
J.M. Vianney is part of the group Rusovu and lives in Rumonge. He is 35 years old and unmarried.

J.M. Vianney has been doing commerce in fish (ndagala) for twenty years.

He is on his 5th Turame loan. With the KIVA loan he is obtaining, he is going to augment his capital and purchase a large amount of fish to resell, so as to earn more.

In the coming years, he would like to raise cows and get married.

loans.use: to purchase a large amount of fish (ndagala) to resell, so as to earn more

loans.name: Angela

texts.es: Angela de 49 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo, ella se dedica a la crianza de cerdos y a la agricultura desde hace 5 años, comercializa sus productos en los diferentes mercados que se encuentran cerca de su casa, con las ganancias que obtiene logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, ella esta solicitando un credito para la compra de concentrado y vitaminas para continuar con la crianza de los cerdos y asi poder continuar con su trabajo para tener mejores ingresos economicos.
texts.en:
Angela is 49 years old and lives in the house she owns with her husband. She has worked raising pigs and farming for five years. She sells her products at different markets close to her home. With the income she earns, she is able to meet some of the household expenses.

She is requesting this loan to purchase feed and vitamins to continue raising pigs so she can continue her work and have a better income.

loans.use: to purchase feed and vitamins.

loans.name: Crisanta

texts.en:
Crisanta is a 60-year-old married woman with three children, one of whom is still in school. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur.

Crisanta has run a business selling brooms in the Philippines for the past 26 years. She has requested a 45,000 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase more raw materials for her business.

Crisanta would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase more raw materials for her business

loans.name: Merilene

texts.en:
Merilene is 57 years old and married with two children. She works very hard to provide for them.

Merilene runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 20,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more stock to sell in her general store.

Merilene has been in this business for 12 years and sells a variety of items such as canned goods, diapers, noodles, coffee, cereals, etc.

Merilene would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase more stock to sell in her general store.

loans.name: Nardita

texts.en:
Irene is 17 years old and is the 5th of 7 children in her family. Her mother, Nardita, is a member of NWTF and she supports the family through her food vending business in the Philippines.

Irene is studying for her Bachelor of Science degree in criminology and she is currently in the 1st year of the 4-year program.

Nardita is borrowing a loan of 4,870 PHP to pay for Irene's tuition fees for the second semester of the 2015-16 school year.

When she graduates, Irene dreams of becoming a successful policewoman so she can help her family in the future.

loans.use: to pay for tuition fees

loans.name: Mizeituni Group

texts.fr: Chibanvunya est une femme d’affaires, membre du groupe de crédits «Mizeituni», cliente de l’IMF Hekima, âgée de 35 ans, mariée, mère de 5 enfants dont 3 scolarisés et 2 sont encore petits. Elle est vendeuse de l’essence sur la route principale de la ville depuis 5 ans. Elle va s’approvisionner en 400 litres d’essence. Elle commença son business avec le capital reçu d’un crédit. Elle souhaite accroitre son crédit, scolariser et nourrir ses enfants. Au final, elle remercie Hekima pour le soutien apporté aux entrepreneurs non bancables. Nous tenons à signaler qu'une cliente porte son bébé.
texts.en:
Chibanvunya is a businesswoman and a member of the loan group “Mizeituni”. A client of the microfinance institution Hekima, she is 35 years old and the married mother of five children, of whom three are in school, and two are still very young. For five years, Chibanvunya has been a vendor of gasoline on the main road in town. She is going to stock up with 400 liters of gasoline.

She began her business with capital from a loan. Her wish is to increase her borrowing and provide education and food for her children. So she thanks Hekima for supporting unbanked entrepreneurs. We really wish to indicate that one client is holding her baby.

loans.use: to stock up with 400 liters of gasoline

loans.name: Kevin Guillermo

texts.es: Kevin  tiene 18 años de edad, es de estado civil soltero, el es una persona muy responsable  con su trabajo, pues trabaja en la venta de gorras. El se dedica hace tres años atrás a este negocio, Kevin solicita el crédito para la compra de más mercadería y así obtener ganancias para sobresaliendo, y poder estudiar.
texts.en: Kevin is 18 years old and is single. He is a very responsible person in his work. He works selling hats and he has been in this business for three years. Kevin is requesting the loan to buy more merchandise and obtain profit to excel and be able to study.

loans.use: to expand his business selling hats.

loans.name: Rosenda

texts.en:
Rosenda is 48 years old and she is married with 2 children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. She has a food vending business in the Philippines.

Rosenda has requested a 16,000 PHP loan through Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation in order to buy ingredients for her food vending business.

Rosenda has been in this business for 4 years. In the future, she would like to build and expand her business so she can secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food vending business.

loans.name: Jose Osbaldo

texts.es:
José, de 42 años de edad, se dedica a la agricultura, creció con sus padres quienes le enseñaron esta actividad, está casado y tiene dos hijos quienes le ayudan en las actividades de la agricultura y la ganadería. 

José, se levanta temprano para ir a las parcelas donde trabaja durante la mañana junto a sus hijos, mientras su esposa se dedica a los oficios domésticos y en la tarde trabaja como motorista en un vehículo y también ordeña las vacas que posee.


José, necesita el préstamo para comprar una yunta de novillos, para que le ayuden a transportar la cosecha hasta su casa y poder arar la tierra en el futuro.

José, sueña con comprar un vehículo.
texts.en:
José, 42 years old, works in agriculture. He grew up with his parents who taught him this occupation. He is married and has two children who help him in the farming and livestock activities.

José gets up early to go to the fields where he works in the morning with his children while his wife carries out the household chores, and in the afternoon, he works as a motorist in a vehicle and also milks the cows that he possesses.

José needs the loan to buy a pair of bullocks to help him transport the harvest to his house and be able to plow the land in the future. He dreams of buying a vehicle.

loans.use: to buy a pair of bullocks.

loans.name: Juan Antonio

texts.es:
Juan, de 48 años de edad,  se dedica a la agricultura y a la ganadería, oficio que aprendió de su padre, estudio hasta sexto grado, está casado, su esposa se dedica a los oficios domésticos y sus hijos le ayudan a sembrar y a cuidar el ganado.

Juan, se levanta temprano para ordeñar las vacas y después se va trabajar durante la mañana junto a sus hijos en la parcela que alquila y durante el resto del día cuida sus animales y ordeña las vacas. 

Juan, necesita el préstamo para comprar una novilla, con la cual espera incrementar la producción de leche y así empezar a producir lácteos.

Juan, sueña con comprar un terreno para poder pastar sus animales y sembrar.
texts.en:
Juan, 48, makes a living in agriculture and ranching, work he learned from his father. He studied up to the sixth grade. He is married. His wife dedicates herself to housework and his children help him plant and care for the cattle.

Juan gets up early to milk the cows and then he goes to work during the morning with his children in the parcel he rents. During the rest of the day he takes care of his animals and milks the cows.

Juan needs the loan in order to buy a heifer with which he hopes to increase the milk production and thus to begin producing dairy products.

Juan dreams of buying a plot of land in order to be able to pasture his animals and plant.

loans.use: to buy a heifer.

loans.name: Benkadi N°I Group

texts.fr:
Ousmane  est le monsieur  qui  tient le bélier.
Un Malien non scolarisé, Il est âgée de  59 ans  marié père de 7 enfants ;tous non scolarisés sa  femme est ménagère. Respectant toujours ses échéances de remboursements avec le RMCR il  fait preuve  de bonne volonté dans son élevage des moutons et prend le prêt pour acheter  beaucoup  de béliers. Il s’approvisionne  dans  les foires environnantes  et revend  ses béliers  en ville.  Il exerce ce métier  il y a plus de 20 ans.  Le profit qu’il gagne lui permet de subvenir à certains besoins de sa famille entre autre la nourriture,  leurs  habits et chaussures. Il est souvent confronté à certaines difficultés  de méventes  et  aux  coûts  chers  des frais de transport des béliers  mais il organise généralement  le voyage avec des éleveurs  de sa localité pour  relever les défis.
texts.en:
Ousmane is the gentleman holding the sheep. An uneducated Malian, he is 59 years old and the married father of seven children, all provide with schooling. His wife is a homemaker.

Always respectful of his payment due dates at RMCR, he has demonstrated a good willingness in his livestock farming of sheep, and he is taking out a loan to purchase many sheep. He gets his supplies from the nearby fairs and resells his sheep in town. He has been practicing this trade for over twenty years.

The profits he earns will enable him to meet certain family needs, including food, clothing, and shoes. He is often confronted with certain difficulties, such as drops in sales and the high cost of transporting the sheep. But he generally organizes trips with other livestock farmers in town in order to meet the challenges.

loans.use: to raise sheep

loans.name: Alicia

texts.en:
Alicia runs a sari-sari (variety) store. She sells basic household commodities such as coffee, eggs, cooking oil, sugar, noodles, shampoo, tooth paste, fabric conditioner and variety of canned goods.

She is a 56-year old married woman and has three children, of which one is still attending school. Her husband is a carpenter. His income is a big help to cater to the household expenses.

Basic commodities is in demand right now, and she would like to fill her store to avoid shortage. She is asking for a loan to buy canned goods, soft drinks and groceries. With these, it could attract potential customers to shop, and enable her to cope with demands.

She is striving hard to continue to improve her livelihood to become successful in the future.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, soft drinks and groceries

loans.name: Fredy Alexander De Jesus

texts.es: Fredy de 31 años de edad vive en casa propia con su madre, el se dedica al cultivo de granos basicos desde hace 4 años y comercializa sus productos en los mercados que estan cerca de su casa, con las ganancias que obtiene logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, el esta solicitando un credito para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes, abonos, controles de plagas, herbicidas, etc. y mejorar el terreno que muestra en la fotografía para poder continuar con sus cultivos ya que esa es su única fuente de trabajo y así tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en: Fredy is 31 years old and lives in his own home with his mother.  He makes a living through the cultivation of basic grains, beginning 4 years ago, and he markets his products in the markets that are close to his home.  With the profits he earns he is able to pay some of his household expenses.  In order to continue with his farming, since that is his only source of work, and also to have a better income; he is applying for a loan for the purchase of seeds, fertilizer, compost, pest controls, herbicides, etc. and to improve his terrain, which is shown in the photograph.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizer, compost, pest controls, herbicides, etc. and to improve his land.

loans.name: Carmen

texts.es: Doña Carmen de 61 años de edad vive en casa propia con su grupo familiar, ella se dedica a la venta de productos de uso personal, vende de manera ambulante por las diferentes colonias que se encuentran cerca de su casa, tiene muchos clientes por la variedad de productos y los buenos preciso, ella está solicitando un crédito para la compra de mas productos perfumes, lociones, cremas, shampoo, desodorantes etc. todo por mayor y así poder seguir con su trabajo para tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en:
Carmen, 61, lives in her own home with her family group. She makes a living selling personal use products. She sells itinerantly in the different neighborhoods found near her house. She has lots of customers due to the variety of products and the good prices.

She is requesting a loan in order to buy more perfume products, lotions, creams, shampoo, deodorants, etc. all at wholesale and in this way to continue with her work in order to have better income.

loans.use: to buy more perfume products, lotions, creams, shampoo, deodorants, etc. all at wholesale.

loans.name: Helen

texts.en:
Helen is 47 years old and she is married with 4 children, 1 of whom is in school. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. She has a general store business in the Philippines.

Helen has requested a 20,000 PHP loan through Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation in order to buy additional stocks of groceries to sell.

Helen has been in this business for 9 years. In the future, she would like to save enough money to be able to expand her business and improve her standard of living.

loans.use: to buy additional stocks of groceries to sell.

loans.name: Roselia

texts.en:
Roselia is a married 44-year-old woman with five children, two of whom are currently in school.

Roselia is in the agricultural business, fattening pigs in the Philippines. She has requested a 25,000 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase feed and other supplies to raise her pigs. She has been in the pig fattening business for the past 5 years and she has borrowed 9 previous loans from NWTF to sustain her business.

In the future, Roselia would like to save enough money to afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase feed and other supplies to raise her pigs.

loans.name: Julie Paola

texts.es: Julie de 32 años es madre soltera de un niño de seis años de edad, ella labora en una empresa privada y alternamente se dedica al comercio de mercancías varias hace tres años, actividad que aprendió de su madre quien es comerciante de toda su vida y en vista de no contar con un cónyuge decidió valerse por sí misma para conseguir el sustento de su hogar. Ella comercializa bolsos, sábanas, cobertores, prendas de vestir, fragancias, productos para el cuidado personal y toda una amplia línea de artículos a sus conocidos, amigos y compañeros de trabajo. Sus compras las realiza en Maicao un municipio de la Guajira y en la actualidad realizó una solicitud de crédito, un credikiva, oportunidad para vincularse a la vida financiera a través de la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo para responder a unos pedidos de sábanas, toallas, cobertores, bisutería. Julie es una joven optimista que desea terminar sus estudios universitarios y ofrecerle a su hijo un excelente futuro.
texts.en: Julie is a 32 year old single mother of a six year old son. She works at a private company, and for three years she has been alternately selling diverse merchandise, a business she learned from her mother who is a merchant. She works doing this since she has no husband, and she wanted to be able to support her household. She sells purses, bed sheets, bedspreads, clothing items, fragrances, personal care products and an ample line of items, to her acquaintances, friends and work colleagues. She buys in Maicao, a municipality of la Guajira. Currently, she applied to a loan, a Credikiva, an opportunity to join the financial life through the Fundacion Mario Santo Domingo, in order to fulfill some orders for bed sheets, towels, bedspreads, custom jewelry. Julie is an optimistic young woman who wants to finish her college education and offer her son an excellent future.

loans.use: to fulfill orders of bed sheets, towels, bedspreads, custom jewelry.

loans.name: Noemi Del Carmen

texts.es:
Noemi, de 59 años de edad, estudio hasta sexto grado, está acompañada, se dedica a la agricultura, este oficio lo aprendió de sus padres y solo tiene 2 hijos.

Noemi, se dedica a trabajar la agricultura en las parcelas que posee, esto lo realiza durante la mañana junto a su  esposo y en el transcurso de la tarde se dedican a ordeñar las vacas y a vender la leche o el queso que producen.


Noemi, necesita el préstamo para comprar otra vaca, para incrementar la producción de leche, porque desea dedicarse por completo a la producción de lácteos.
 
Noemi, sueña con comprar más vacas lecheras y poder comprar un terreno donde pastarla.
texts.en:
Noemi, 59, went to school until the sixth grade. She has a partner. She works in agriculture, a skill she learned from her parents. She has only two children.

Noemi works in agriculture on her own plots of land. She does this in the mornings alongside her husband. During the afternoons, they milk the cows and sell the milk or the cheese they make.

Noemi needs this loan to buy another cow to increase milk production, because she wants to focus completely on dairy products.

Noemi dreams of buying more dairy cows and being able to buy land for them to graze.

loans.use: to buy another cow.

loans.name: Ruth

texts.en: Ruth is a 28-year-old single lady living in Fort Portal, Uganda. She is a civil servant working with the local government. In addition, she runs a boutique in a busy market near Fort Portal town. She started this business with the hope of earning income and having a more time after work. She used part of her monthly salary savings to start up her business. She is responsible for feeding her son and looking after herself. Ruth has asked for a loan to help pay for labor to construct her house.

loans.use: to help pay for labor to construct her house.

loans.name: Marta

texts.es: Doña Marta de 55 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo, ella tiene el servicio de venta de gas propano desde hace 8 años su negocio esta ubicado en su lugar de residencia y tiene muchos clientes por ser un prodcuto muy vendible, con las ganancias que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, ella esta solicitando un credito para la compra de mas tambos de gas propano por mayor para poder tener mejores ingresos economicos.
texts.en:
Marta, 55, lives in her own house with her husband. She has had a propane gas sales service for eight years. Her business is located in her place of residence and she has many customers since it is a very marketable product. With the earnings she gets from her sales, she is able to cover some of the household expenses.

She is requesting a loan in order to buy more propane gas tanks wholesale in order to have better economic income.

loans.use: to buy more propane gas tanks wholesale.

loans.name: La Victoria Group

texts.es:
15 son las mujeres que integran este grupo, están dentro del programa de eliminación de la pobreza, cada una haciendo su mayor esfuerzo para poder mejorar sus condiciones de vida y la de sus seres queridos.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Joaquina, ella es la tesorera del grupo, tiene como emprendimiento la venta de prendas de todo tipo, comenta que por medio de sus ventas, tiene los medios para poder ayudar a su familia y seres queridos. Joaquina empezó con muy poco, pero poco a poco se ha abierto camino y ya tiene muy buena clientela.
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en la compra de prendas variadas de todo tipo, como ser remeras, camisas, jeans,  pantalones, vestidos y otros, y de esa manera poder seguir con sus ventas como lo viene haciendo.
texts.en:
Fifteen women make up this group. They are in the Poverty Stoplight program and each member is making a major effort to improve their living conditions and that of their loved ones.

One of the members is Joaquina and she is the treasurer of the group. Her enterprise is the sales of all types of clothing. She comments that through her sales she has the means of being able to help her family and her loved ones. Joaquina started with very little but bit by bit she has made progress and now she has a very good clientele.

She is requesting this loan to be able to invest in the purchase of a variety of clothing like t-shirts, shirts, jeans, pants, dresses and others. In this way she can continue with her sales as she has been doing.

loans.use: to buy a variety of clothing to sell, like t-shirts, shirts, jeans, pants, dresses and others.

loans.name: Melba

texts.en:
Melba is a hardworking 32-year-old woman who earns a living running a sari-sari (variety) store, which she has used to manage the economy of her house. She sells coffee, noodles, chips, bread, shampoo and cooking oil. She has her own property where she lives with her two-school aged children and her husband and she is happy to have her family.

Melba wants to continue improving her quality of life, which is why she is requesting a loan with CEVI to invest to invest in soft drinks and other goods to continue improving her business. She used the previous loan to stock her shop and wants to continue doing so.

loans.use: to invest in soft drinks and other goods

loans.name: Porferia

texts.en:
For the past five years, Porferia has engaged in weaving baskets made of palm. She is a married woman and has two grown children. She resides in the rural town of Antequera.

She has requested a loan to purchase materials for basket weaving like nito (palm) and wicker (pliable twig). These could help enhance her source of income and slowly enable her to settle her obligation. Thus, her income will be augmented and she will try to invest in other sources of income.

Porferia is thankful for the funds and is determined to manage them successfully to continue to seek ways to become more sustainable.

loans.use: to purchase materials for basket weaving like nito (palm) and wicker (pliable twig).

loans.name: Aleli

texts.en:
Aleli is a 52-year-old married woman with six children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur.

Aleli has a food vending business in the Philippines. She has requested a 23,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy ingredients such as rice, coconut leaves, etc. for her food production business. She successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business.

Aleli has been in this business for 26 years. Aleli would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy ingredients such as rice, coconut leaves, etc. for her food production business.

loans.name: Gulzhan

texts.ru: Гулжан, 45 лет, замужем, супруг пенсионер. Гулжан работает моляром. У нее среднее образование, уже много лет она занимается животноводством. Сумев развить свой бизнес, на сегодняшний день, благодаря ее упорству и целеустремленности, в хозяйстве Гулжан имеется 4 коровы, есть огород. Она хочет и дальше приумножить ее бизнес, в связи с этим обратилась в Банк «Бай-Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 40,000 сом (KGS), на полученные средства она приобретет дойную корову для увеличения поголовья и продажи экологически чистого молока. На доходы от кредита Гулжан хочет увеличить поголовье скота и построить дом для ее семьи.
texts.en:
Gulzhan is 45 years old.  Her husband is retired.  Gulzhan herself works as a house painter.  She has a secondary education and has also been involved in animal husbandry for many years.  She has been able to grow her business and, thanks to her perseverance and dedication, she has come to the point where she now has four cows as well as an orchard.

Gulzhan would like to further expand her business and, with this goal in mind, she has turned to Kiva's partner, Bai Tushum Bank, and requested a loan of 40,000 som (KGS).  She will use her loan to buy a dairy cow to increase her cattle headcount and also her production of organic milk.  She wants to use the earnings from her loan to further increase the size of her herd, and she would also like to build a house for her family.

loans.use: to buy one dairy cow and increase her sales of organic milk.

loans.name: Avelina

texts.en:
Avelina is a 45-year-old married woman with four children, three of whom are currently in school. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur.

Avelina has a motorcycle transport business in the Philippines. She has requested a 15,000 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase spare parts for the maintenance of her motorcycle. She successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business.

Avelina has been in this business for 10 years. In the future, she would like to save enough money to afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase spare parts for the maintenance of her motorcycle.

loans.name: Carolina

texts.en:
Carolina is 51 years old and married with four children.

Carolina is in the agricultural business, fattening pigs in the Philippines. She has requested a loan of 11,000 PHP through NWTF to purchase piglets, feed, and vitamins for her pigs. Carolina has been in pig fattening for the past 5 years and she has borrowed 11 previous loans NWTF to sustain her business.

Carolina would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase piglets, feed, and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Leonida

texts.en:
As a married mother of two children, Leonida works hard to support her family.

She has a general store business in the Philippines. Leonida is borrowing PHP 16,000 through NWTF in order to buy more stock of groceries like canned goods, personal care products and other groceries for her general store business.

Leonida has been sustaining her business activities through her past 6 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money so she can continue to send her children to school.

loans.use: to buy more stock of groceries like canned goods, personal care products and other groceries.

loans.name: Tu Eres Mi Rey Group

texts.es: Grupo solidario está integrado por cuatro mujeres socias exitosas, coordinado por la señora Meyling de 23 años de edad, casada y madre de dos hijos se dedica al estilismo y a  comercializar ropa nueva como blusas y jeans, este negocio lo empezó gracias a la ayuda brindada por su esposo. El crédito lo requiere para la compra de mercadería como es camisetas, blusas, licras, talladores, brasieres, blúmer, bóxer, etc. Otra de las socias es la señora Karla de 38 años dedicada a la venta de perfumes, calzados y costura para ganarse el pan de cada día honradamente. Judithe, de 32 años tiene un taller de costura, y doña Jasmina de 40 años a la venta de frijoles cocidos y leña
texts.en:
This group is made up of four successful women. It is coordinated by Meyling, 23, who is married and has two children. She works as a cosmetologist and sells new clothing such as blouses and jeans. She started this business thanks to the support of her husband. She needs this loan to buy merchandise such as t-shirts, blouses, spandex pants, shapewear, bras, panties, boxer shorts, etc.

Another one of the members is Karla, 38, who works selling perfumes, shoes, and sewing in order to make an honest living. Judithe, 32, has a sewing workshop, and Jasmina, 40, sells cooked beans and firewood.

loans.use: to buy merchandise such as t-shirts, blouses, spandex pants, shapewear, bras, panties, boxer shorts, etc.

loans.name: San Francisco Group

texts.es:
El grupo de nombre San Francisco, se formó en la ciudad de Curuguaty, una zona alejada de la capital del país, aun en crecimiento y de difícil acceso a ciertos servicios. En su mayoría las integrantes se dedican a actividades rurales.
La Sra. Teodora es una de las integrantes, ella se dedica a las ventas de leche, queso y gallinas y otros animales de corral, que ella misma cría y por medio de este trabajo tiene los medios para poder ayudar a su familia.
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en la compra de balanceados para animales y animales para la cría. Agradece por la oportunidad que recibe de poder seguir creciendo como lo viene haciendo.
texts.en:
San Francisco group was formed in the city of Curuguaty, the area is cut off from the country's capital and it's difficult to access to certain services. Most of the members work in rural areas.
Teodora is one of them. She sells milk, cheese, chicken and other farm animals that she breeds herself and thanks to this work she has the means to help her family.
She is asking for this loan to buy animal feed and animals to breed. She is thankful for this opportunity she's been given to keep growing and she's done thus far.

loans.use: to buy animal feed and animals to breed

loans.name: Alanita

texts.en:
Thirty-three-year old Alanita engages in a chorizo (sausage) vending business. She is married and has two young dependents. Her husband is a welder. She resides in the town of Talibon.

She would like to improve her earnings in order to cater to the needs of her family. Alanita has requested a loan to buy more supplies of chorizo (sausage). This could help improve her livelihood and continue to expand. In that way, she would be able to invest in other possible business opportunities to become more financially stable.

Alanita is hoping that she would be able to finance the schooling of her children for a brighter future.

loans.use: to buy more supplies of chorizo (sausage).

loans.name: Rosita

texts.en:
Rosita is married and has nine children, three of whom are still attending school. She farms rice as well as buying and selling coconuts to earn a living.

Rosita has applied for a 10,000 PHP loan through Kiva's field partner CEVI to buy fertilizer for her fields to ensure a bountiful harvest and additional capital to support and grow her coconut shell business. She dreams of a small business that could reliably support her family in the future.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer for her rice fields and additional capital to grow her coconut shell business.

loans.name: Nelia

texts.en:
As a married mother of 4 children, Nelia works hard to support her family.

She has a general store business in the Philippines. Nelia is borrowing PHP 30,000 through NWTF in order to buy more groceries like canned goods, spices, personal care products, and other miscellaneous items to sell.

Nelia has been sustaining her business activities through her past 25 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy more groceries like canned goods, spices, personal care products, and other miscellaneous items to sell.

loans.name: Ma. Chona

texts.en:
Chona is a hardworking woman entrepreneur with three children.

She earns a living by raising pigs in the Philippines and is borrowing PHP 8,000 through NWTF in order to buy feeds and repair her pig-pens.

She supplements this income with earnings from her poultry business.

Chona dreams that one day she will be able to repair and renovate her family home.

loans.use: to buy feeds and repair her pig-pens.

loans.name: Desiree

texts.en:
Desiree is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a business buying and selling dry goods in the Philippines. She has been in this business for 6 years. Desiree earns additional income from selling avon products.

Desiree is borrowing 15,000 PHP through NWTF to buy more stock of dry goods to sell to her customers. She has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of loans from NWTF. She dreams to save money and expand her business in the future.

loans.use: to buy more stock of dry goods to sell to her customers.

loans.name: Alicia

texts.en:
Alicia is 53 years old and married with six children. For the past four years she has worked hard at buying and selling rice to make a living in the Philippines.

Alicia has applied for a 11,000 PHP loan through Kiva's field partner NWTF in order to buy additional stocks of rice to sell. She is working to save enough money to expand her business in the future.

loans.use: to buy additional stocks of rice to sell.
